Command.name: Running Processes
Command.content: '#Reference #System.Windows.Forms, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089, processorArchitecture=MSIL '#Language "WWB.NET" Imports System.Diagnostics 'Access the Process namespace Sub Main Dim sProcesses() As Process Dim sProcess As Process Dim s, p As String On Error GoTo ErrorHandler ' Get all running system processes sProcesses = System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses() s = "" s = vbCrLf & "Procss Names currently running: " & vbCrLf & vbCRLf For Each sProcess In sProcesses ' compose a string with all the process names separated commas s = s + sProcess.ProcessName() & ", " Next ' Display all the processes currently running in a MessageBox MsgBox s ErrorHandler:: ' deal with error here if required End Sub

Command.name: Mouse Location
Command.description: Copies the Current Mouse Position To the Clipboard
Command.content:
Option Explicit
Type RECT Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type
Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type
' declare Win32 API functions
Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetCursorPos" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long
Declare Function GetWindowRect Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetWindowRect" (ByVal hwnd As Long, _ lpRect As RECT) As Long
Declare Function GetForegroundWindow& Lib "user32" ()
Function GetWinCurPos(hwnd As Long) As POINTAPI
Dim pt As POINTAPI Dim wRect As RECT Dim result As POINTAPI
GetCursorPos pt
GetWindowRect hwnd, wRect
result.x = pt.x - wRect.Left result.y = pt.y - wRect.Top
GetWinCurPos = result End Function
Sub Main Dim hwnd As Long Dim result As POINTAPI Dim clip As String
hwnd = GetForegroundWindow result = GetWinCurPos(hwnd)
clip = "SetMousePosition 1," & result.x & _ "," & result.y ' Clipboard clip ' End Sub

Command.name: Restore User Profile
Command.content: Sub Main 'This command relies on the hotkeys Dragon menu option being set to {NumKey*} 'In SendKeys terms this key is represented by {Pad*} 'To see a list of key names click on the "Keys" button above SendKeys"{Pad*}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "p" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "r" End Sub

Command.name: Go To Dragon Commands File
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl ShellExecute EngineControl.SpeakerDirectory + EngineControl.Speaker + "\Current\" Wait 1 SendKeys"m" End Sub

Command.name: Full Screenshot To Printer
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Prtsc}" ' Using Dragon Pad will print the screen full size ' if you want to on a page try something like WordPad ' using ShellExecute"WordPad" as your next line EmulateRecognition"Start DragonPad" Wait 3 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^p" Wait 0.2 SendKeys"~" SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.name: Full ScreenShot To File
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Prtsc}" ' Use something like WordPad if you want the screenshot on one page ' so line below would be ShellExecute "WordPad" ShellExecute "mspaint" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "~" TTSPlayString "name" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "\Caps-On" SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.name: Check Microphone
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl EngineControl.DlgShow(dgndlgAudioSetupWizard,0,,0) Wait 0.5 SendKeys"%n" Wait 0.5 SendKeys"%s" TTSPlayString "go" End Sub

Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main 'SetMicrophone 0 Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl EngineControl.DlgShow(dgndlgCommandBrowser,0,,0) wait 2 SendKeys "%3" Wait 1 SendKeys "^i" TTSPlayString "browse to the appropriate location" End Sub

Command.name: About Dragon
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main 'set reference to dragon API Dim EngControl As New DgnEngineControl EngControl.DlgShow(dgndlgAbout,0,,0) End Sub

Command.name: <trayaction> System Tray <1to20>
Command.content:
Declare Function FindWindowEx Lib "user32" Alias _ "FindWindowExA" (ByVal hWnd1 As Long, ByVal hWnd2 As Long, _ ByVal lpsz1 As String, ByVal lpsz2 As String) As Long
Declare Function SetForegroundWindow Lib "user32" _ Alias "SetForegroundWindow" (ByVal Hwnd As Long)As Long
Declare Function FindWindow Lib "user32" Alias _ "FindWindowA" (ByVal lpClassName As String, ByVal _ lpWindowName As String) As Long
Sub Main Dim h1,h2 As Long h1 = FindWindow "Shell_TrayWnd","" h2 = FindWindowEx h1,0,"TrayNotifyWnd","" SetMousePosition 0, 0, 0 Wait 0.2 SetForegroundWindow(h2) Wait 0.1
If ListVar1 = "right click" Then SendKeys"{Right "+ListVar2+"}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys"+{F10}" End If If ListVar1 = "left click" Then SendKeys"{Right "+ListVar2+"}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys"{Space}" End If If ListVar1 = "click" Then SendKeys"{Right "+ListVar2+"}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys"{Space}" End If If ListVar1 = "double click" Then SendKeys"{Right "+ListVar2+"}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys"~" End If
End Sub

Command.name: Add Sentence
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{End}{Space}" HeardWord "\cap" End Sub

Command.name: Back Tab
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "+{Tab}" End Sub

Command.name: Back Tab <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "+{Tab "+ListVar1+"}" End Sub

Command.name: Check My Inbox
Command.content: Sub Main Wait 0.01 AppSwapWith "Outlook" Wait 1 SendKeys "^y" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Home}inbox" Wait .1 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 1 SendKeys "{F9}" End Sub

Command.name: Check My Internet Speed
Command.content: Sub Main ShellExecute "http://www.speedtest.net/" End Sub

Command.name: Letters <myalphabet>
Command.content: Sub Main t1 = Mid$(ListVar1,1,InStr(ListVar1, "\")-1) if t1 = "backslash" Then t1 = "\" if t1 = "space" Then t1 = " " SendKeys t1 End Sub

Command.name: Normal Mode
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "normal","mode","on" End Sub

Command.name: Over
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 1 HeardWord "\cap" End Sub

Command.name: Over And Out
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 1 SendKeys "%{F4}" End Sub

Command.name: Restart Windows
Command.content: Sub Main TTSPlayString "restart windows?" If MsgBox("Windows will now be restarted, before clicking Ok you should make " _ + "sure that all necessary files are saved and the Dragon user profile is " _ + "saved if required", vbOkCancel ) = vbOk Then ShellExecute "shutdown.exe -r -t 00 -f" End If End Sub

Command.name: Say It In <Language>
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 HeardWord "view","recognition","history" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Up}%u^c" Wait 1 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 1 if ListVar1 = "Afrikaans" then ShellExecute "http://translate.google.com/#auto|af|" if ListVar1 = "Albanian" then ShellExecute "http://translate.google.com/#auto|sq|" if ListVar1 = "Arabic" then ShellExecute "http://translate.google.com/#auto|ar|" if ListVar1 = "Belarusian" then ShellExecute "http://translate.google.com/#auto|be|" if ListVar1 = "Bulgarian" then ShellExecute Command.name: Shutdown Windows
Command.content: Sub Main TTSPlayString "Shut down Windows?" If MsgBox("Windows will now be shutdown, before clicking Ok you should make " _ + "sure that all necessary files are saved and the Dragon user profile is " _ + "saved if required", vbOkCancel ) = vbOk Then ShellExecute "shutdown.exe -s -t 00 -f" End If End Sub

Command.name: Zoom <In_Out>
Command.content: 'Script copyright Mr Wilke, RW Programs 2015 Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long Const VK_CTRL = 17 Declare Function mouse_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, ByVal dx As _ Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) As Long Const WHEEL_DELTA = 120 Const MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL = &H800 Sub Main keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) Select Case ListVar1 Case "In" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, WHEEL_DELTA, 0) Case "Out" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, -WHEEL_DELTA, 0) End Select keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,2,0) End Sub

Command.name: KnowBrainer Login
Command.content:
'#Reference {EAB22AC0-30C1-11CF-A7EB-0000C05BAE0B}#1.1#0#C:\Windows\SysWOW64\ieframe.dll#Microsoft Internet Controls#SHDocVw '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\PROGRA~2\Nuance\NATURA~1\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools 'Script Lindsay Adam pcbyvoice 2015 www.pcbyvoice.com Const READYSTATE_COMPLETE = 4 ' Declare Internet Explorer object Dim IE As SHDocVw.InternetExplorer Sub Main MsgBox "The first time you run this command you will see this message box. After the command completes you will likely get a message that your login credentials are invalid. Please open the command and change the username and password on lines 27 and 28. Then remove line 6 which is this message." ' create instance of InternetExplorer Set IE = New InternetExplorer ' using your newly created instance of Internet Explorer With IE .Visible = True .Navigate2 "http://www.knowbrainer.com/forums/forum/index.cfm" ' Wait until page we are navigating to is loaded Do While .Busy Loop Do Loop Until .ReadyState = READYSTATE_COMPLETE ' the username and password values will not exist if already logged in ' so no need to fill in the values and go straight to Next On Error Resume Next If Err Then 'Do Nothing Else ' When the page is fully loaded enter your username and password ' you will need to set these appropriately With .Document.forms("login" ) .FTVAR_USERNAMEFRM.value = "TYPE YOUR USER NAME HERE" .FTVAR_PASSWORDFRM.value = "TYPE YOUR PASSWORD HERE" .submit End With ' Wait until fully logged in Do While .Busy Loop End If
'.Navigate2 "https://caaware.dor.ca.gov/aware5/VR/Landing.aspx#=y"
End With ' Tidy Up Set IE = Nothing End Sub

Command.name: Set All <FontFace> <FontSize>
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Times" then param1 = "Times New Roman" if ListVar1 = "Courier" then param1 = "Courier New" if ListVar1 = "Arial" then param1 = "Arial" if ListVar1 = "Comic" then param1 = "Comic Sans MS" if ListVar1 = "Impact" then param1 = "Impact" if ListVar1 = "Garamond" then param1 = "Garamond" if ListVar1 = "Kaufmann" then param1 = "Kaufmann BT" if ListVar1 = "Monotype" then param1 = "Monotype Corsiva" if ListVar3 = "Plain" then param3 = "Regular" if ListVar3 = "Plain text" then param3 = "Regular" if ListVar3 = "Underline" then param3 = "%u" if ListVar3 = "Italics" then param3 = "Italic" if ListVar3 = "Bold" then param3 = "bold" SendKeys "^a%of%f" + param1 + "%s" + ListVar2 + "~{Right}" End Sub

Command.name: Undo <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main For i = 1 To Val(ListVar1) SendKeys "^z" Next Wait 0.5 EmulateRecognition "go back" End Sub

Command.name: Title That
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{End}+{Home}" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\all-caps","that" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^e" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Enter 2}^l" End Sub

Command.name: Redo <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main For i = 1 To Val(ListVar1) SendKeys "^y" Next Wait 0.5 EmulateRecognition "go back" End Sub

Command.name: Line <1to100> Times
Command.content: Sub Main For i = 1 To Val(ListVar1) SendKeys "_" Next SendKeys " " End Sub

Command.name: Close <1to20> Tabs
Command.content: Sub Main For i = 1 To Val(ListVar1) Wait 1 SendKeys "^{F4}" Next End Sub

Command.name: Zoom Out <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Pad- "+ListVar1+"}" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Home}" Wait .5 SendKeys "^h" Wait .1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "~" Wait .2 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait .5 SendKeys "^c" Wait 1 HeardWord "add","word" Wait 2 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%a" Wait 1 SendKeys "^{Down}" End Sub

Command.name: Read <Read>
Command.content: SetMicrophone 0 if _arg1 = "That" then SendKeys "" if _arg1 = "Document" then SendKeys "{Ctrl+a}" if _arg1 = "All" then SendKeys "{Ctrl+a}" if _arg1 = "Next Paragraph" then SendSystemKeys "{Ctrl+Down}{Ctrl+Shift+Up}" if _arg1 = "Previous Paragraph" then SendSystemKeys "{Ctrl+Down}{Ctrl+Shift+Down}" if _arg1 = "Line" then SendSystemKeys "{Home}{Shift+End}" if _arg1 = "Paragraph" then SendSystemKeys "{Ctrl+Down}{Ctrl+Shift+Up}" if _arg1 = "To Here" then SendKeys "{Ctrl+Shift+Home}" if _arg1 = "To End" then SendKeys "{Ctrl+Shift+End}" Wait 500 SendKeys "{Ctrl+c}" Wait 500 SendKeys "{Right}" Wait 250 TTSPlayString "" SetMicrophone 1

Command.content: SendKeys "{Ctrl+a}{Ctrl+x}" Wait 200 if _arg1 = "Access" Then AppBringUp "MSAccess" if _arg1 = "Excel" Then AppBringUp "Excel" if _arg1 = "Google Chrome" Then AppBringUp "chrome" if _arg1 = "Firefox" Then AppBringUp "firefox" if _arg1 = "Internet Explorer" Then AppBringUp "iexplore" if _arg1 = "Dragon" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" if _arg1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" if _arg1 = "Next Window" Then SendSystemKeys "{Alt+Esc}" if _arg1 = "Previous Window" Then SendSystemKeys "{Alt+Shift+Esc}" if _arg1 = "Other Window" Then SendSystemKeys "{Alt+Tab}" if _arg1 = "Notepad" Then AppBringUp "Notepad" if _arg1 = "One Note" Then AppBringUp "onenote" if _arg1 = "Outlook" Then AppBringUp "Outlook" if _arg1 = "Paint" Then AppBringUp "mspaint" if _arg1 = "Microsoft Paint" Then AppBringUp "mspaint" if _arg1 = "PowerPoint" Then AppBringUp "PowerPnt" if _arg1 = "Skype" Then AppBringUp "Skype" if _arg1 = "Word" Then AppBringUp "WinWord" if _arg1 = "Wordpad" Then AppBringUp "WordPad" if _arg1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch","to","WordPerfect" Wait 1000 SendKeys "{Ctrl+v}" Wait 100 SendKeys "{Right}"

Command.content: SendKeys "{Ctrl+a}{Ctrl+x}" Wait 200 if _arg1 = "Access" Then AppBringUp "MSAccess" if _arg1 = "Excel" Then AppBringUp "Excel" if _arg1 = "Google Chrome" Then AppBringUp "chrome" if _arg1 = "Firefox" Then AppBringUp "firefox" if _arg1 = "Internet Explorer" Then AppBringUp "iexplore" if _arg1 = "Dragon" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" if _arg1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" if _arg1 = "Next Window" Then SendSystemKeys "{Alt+Esc}" if _arg1 = "Previous Window" Then SendSystemKeys "{Alt+Shift+Esc}" if _arg1 = "Other Window" Then SendSystemKeys "{Alt+Tab}" if _arg1 = "Notepad" Then AppBringUp "Notepad" if _arg1 = "One Note" Then AppBringUp "onenote" if _arg1 = "Outlook" Then AppBringUp "Outlook" if _arg1 = "Paint" Then AppBringUp "mspaint" if _arg1 = "Microsoft Paint" Then AppBringUp "mspaint" if _arg1 = "PowerPoint" Then AppBringUp "PowerPnt" if _arg1 = "Skype" Then AppBringUp "Skype" if _arg1 = "Word" Then AppBringUp "WinWord" if _arg1 = "Wordpad" Then AppBringUp "WordPad" if _arg1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch","to","WordPerfect" Wait 1000 SendKeys "{Ctrl+v}" Wait 200 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 1000 SendSystemKeys "{Alt+Tab}"

Command.content: SendKeys "{Ctrl+x}" Wait 200 if _arg1 = "Access" Then AppBringUp "MSAccess" if _arg1 = "Excel" Then AppBringUp "Excel" if _arg1 = "Google Chrome" Then AppBringUp "chrome" if _arg1 = "Firefox" Then AppBringUp "firefox" if _arg1 = "Internet Explorer" Then AppBringUp "iexplore" if _arg1 = "Dragon" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" if _arg1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" if _arg1 = "Next Window" Then SendSystemKeys "{Alt+Esc}" if _arg1 = "Previous Window" Then SendSystemKeys "{Alt+Shift+Esc}" if _arg1 = "Other Window" Then SendSystemKeys "{Alt+Tab}" if _arg1 = "Notepad" Then AppBringUp "Notepad" if _arg1 = "One Note" Then AppBringUp "onenote" if _arg1 = "Outlook" Then AppBringUp "Outlook" if _arg1 = "Paint" Then AppBringUp "mspaint" if _arg1 = "Microsoft Paint" Then AppBringUp "mspaint" if _arg1 = "PowerPoint" Then AppBringUp "PowerPnt" if _arg1 = "Skype" Then AppBringUp "Skype" if _arg1 = "Word" Then AppBringUp "WinWord" if _arg1 = "Wordpad" Then AppBringUp "WordPad" if _arg1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch","to","WordPerfect" Wait 1000 SendKeys "{Ctrl+v}" Wait 100 SendKeys "{Right}"

Command.name: Cut To <AppList> Back
Command.content: SendKeys "{Ctrl+x}" Wait 200 if _arg1 = "Access" Then AppBringUp "MSAccess" if _arg1 = "Excel" Then AppBringUp "Excel" if _arg1 = "Google Chrome" Then AppBringUp "chrome" if _arg1 = "Firefox" Then AppBringUp "firefox" if _arg1 = "Internet Explorer" Then AppBringUp "iexplore" if _arg1 = "Dragon" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" if _arg1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" if _arg1 = "Next Window" Then SendSystemKeys "{Alt+Esc}" if _arg1 = "Previous Window" Then SendSystemKeys "{Alt+Shift+Esc}" if _arg1 = "Other Window" Then SendSystemKeys "{Alt+Tab}" if _arg1 = "Notepad" Then AppBringUp "Notepad" if _arg1 = "One Note" Then AppBringUp "onenote" if _arg1 = "Outlook" Then AppBringUp "Outlook" if _arg1 = "Paint" Then AppBringUp "mspaint" if _arg1 = "Microsoft Paint" Then AppBringUp "mspaint" if _arg1 = "PowerPoint" Then AppBringUp "PowerPnt" if _arg1 = "Skype" Then AppBringUp "Skype" if _arg1 = "Word" Then AppBringUp "WinWord" if _arg1 = "Wordpad" Then AppBringUp "WordPad" if _arg1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch","to","WordPerfect" Wait 1000 SendKeys "{Ctrl+v}" Wait 200 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 1000 SendSystemKeys "{Alt+Tab}"

Command.name: Previous Field <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "previous field" Wait 1 SendKeys ListVar1 End Sub

Command.name: Next Field <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "next field" Wait 1 SendKeys ListVar1 End Sub

Command.name: Open Startup Folder
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{WindowsHold}r" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "shell:startup" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: Code Beep
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "Beep" End Sub

Command.name: Sample Change <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Home}" Wait .5 SendKeys "^h" Wait .1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "~" Wait .2 SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Capture PNG
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{Prtsc}" ShellExecute "mspaint" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "~" TTSPlayString "name" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "\caps-on" SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.name: Capture PNG To Printer
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{Prtsc}" ' Using WordPad will fit the screenshot on one page ' if you want the full size screen print you could try ' something like ShellExecute"MSPaint" as your next line ShellExecute"WordPad" Wait 3 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^p" Wait 0.2 SendKeys"~" SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.name: Capture PNG To File
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{Prtsc}" ShellExecute "mspaint" Wait 1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "~" TTSPlayString "name" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "\caps-on" SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.name: Code <Direction> <dictation>
Command.description: Move in any direction, force dictation and press the spacebar
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Previous" Then SendKeys "{Left}" If ListVar1 = "Next" Then SendKeys "{Right}" If ListVar1 = "Tab" Then SendKeys "{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Shift Tab" Then SendKeys "+{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys "{Left}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys "{Right}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "{Down}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "{Up}" SendKeys ListVar2 End Sub

Command.name: Code <Direction> <1to20> <dictation>
Command.description: Move in any direction 1 to 20 times, force dictation and press the spacebar
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Previous" Then SendKeys "{Left "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Next" Then SendKeys "{Right "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Tab" Then SendKeys "{Tab "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Shift Tab" Then SendKeys "+{Tab "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys "{Left "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys "{Right "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "{Down "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "{Up "+ListVar2+"}" SendKeys ListVar3 End Sub

Command.name: Code Back <dictation>
Command.description: Used to force dictation into any field you can type in
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 1 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: PS
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left}{End}+{Enter 2}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "PS:" Wait 0.2 HeardWord "\cap" End Sub

Command.name: Paste Line
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left}{End}+{Enter}^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "+{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: <Direction> <1to1000> Words
Command.content: Sub Main value = CInt (ListVar2) If value > 99 Then For i = 1 To value/50 If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys"^{Left 50}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys"^{Right 50}" Next Else If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys "^{Left "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys "^{Right "+ListVar2+"}" End If End Sub

Command.name: <Direction> <1to1000> Paragraphs
Command.content: Sub Main value = CInt (ListVar2) If value > 99 Then For i = 1 To value/50 If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys"^{Up 50}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys"^{Down 50}" Next Else If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "^{Up "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "^{Down "+ListVar2+"}" End If End Sub

Command.name: Volume Down <1to100>
Command.content: Sub Main AppBringUp "C:\Windows\System32\SndVol.exe" Wait 1 SendKeys"{Down "+ListVar1+"}" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 1 TTSPlayString "sound check" End Sub

Command.name: Volume Up <1to100>
Command.content: Sub Main AppBringUp "C:\Windows\System32\SndVol.exe" Wait 1 SendKeys"{Up "+ListVar1+"}" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 1 TTSPlayString "sound check" End Sub

Command.name: Volume Level <1to100>
Command.description: Change your volume output level from 1 to 100 (maximum)
Command.content: Sub Main AppBringUp "C:\Windows\System32\SndVol.exe" Wait 1 SendKeys "{End}" Wait 1 SendKeys"{Up "+ListVar1+"}" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Sound Level <1to100>
Command.description: Change your volume output level from 1 to 100 (maximum)
Command.content: Sub Main AppBringUp "C:\Windows\System32\SndVol.exe" Wait 1 SendKeys "{End}" Wait 1 SendKeys"{Up "+ListVar1+"}" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Next <Character>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^h" Wait .5 SendKeys ""+ListVar1+"{Enter}" Wait .5 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Right}" End Sub

Command.name: Capture Screen To <AppList>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Prtsc}" If ListVar1 = "Evernote" Then EmulateRecognition "switch to Evernote" If ListVar1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Excel" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Excel" If ListVar1 = "NaturallySpeaking" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Next Window" Then SendKeys "%{Esc}" If ListVar1 = "One Note" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Onenote" If ListVar1 = "Other Window" Then SendKeys "%{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Outlook" If ListVar1 = "Paint" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Paint" If ListVar1 = "Previous Window" Then SendKeys "%+{Esc}" If ListVar1 = "Publisher" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Publisher" If ListVar1 = "Word" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Word" If ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Wordpad" If ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Word Perfect" Wait 1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%{Tab}" End Sub

Command.name: Close Without Saving <AppList>
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Access" Then HeardWord "switch to ACCESS" If ListVar1 = "Act" Then HeardWord "switch to ACT" If ListVar1 = "AOL" Then HeardWord "switch to AOL" If ListVar1 = "Dialer" Then HeardWord "switch to Dialer" If ListVar1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "switch to DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Excel" Then HeardWord "switch to Excel" If ListVar1 = "Firefox" Then HeardWord "switch to Firefox" If ListVar1 = "Free Cell" Then HeardWord "switch to FREE CELL" If ListVar1 = "Front Page" Then HeardWord "switch to FRONT Page" If ListVar1 = "Groove" Then HeardWord "switch to GROOVE" If ListVar1 = "Info Path" Then HeardWord "switch to INFO PATH" If ListVar1 = "Internet Explorer" Then HeardWord "switch to Internet Explorer" If ListVar1 = "iTunes" Then HeardWord "switch to iTunes" If ListVar1 = "Microsoft Word" Then HeardWord "switch to Word" If ListVar1 = "Notepad" Then HeardWord "switch to Notepad" If ListVar1 = "One Note" Then HeardWord "switch to One Note" If ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then HeardWord "switch to Outlook" If ListVar1 = "Paint" Then EmulateRecognition "switch to paint" If ListVar1 = "Photo House" Then HeardWord "switch to Photo House" If ListVar1 = "Power Point" Then HeardWord "switch to Power Point" If ListVar1 = "Publisher" Then HeardWord "switch to Microsoft Publisher" If ListVar1 = "Snag It" Then HeardWord "switch to SnagIt" If ListVar1 = "Sound Recorder" Then HeardWord "switch to sound recorder" If ListVar1 = "Word" Then HeardWord "switch to Word" If ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then HeardWord "switch to Wordpad" If ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch to WordPerfect" If ListVar1 = "Write" Then HeardWord "switch to Write" Wait 1.5 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%n" End Sub

Command.name: Go To Desktop <0to9>
Command.description: Allows You to Switch From the 1st to 9th Virtual Desktop (courtesy of Daryl Davis)
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{WindowsHold}^{Left 9}", True If (ListVar1 <> "1" ) Then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}^{Right " & CStr(CInt(ListVar1)-1) & "}", True End Sub

Command.name: <Format> Back
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Uppercase" Then HeardWord "\all-caps","that" If ListVar1 = "Lowercase" Then HeardWord "\no-caps","that" If ListVar1 = "Title Case" Then HeardWord "\cap","that" If ListVar1 = "Capitalize" Then HeardWord "\cap","that" If ListVar1 = "Title" Then HeardWord "\cap","that" If ListVar1 = "Italicize" Then SendKeys "^i" If ListVar1 = "Italics" Then SendKeys "^i" If ListVar1 = "Underline" Then SendKeys "^u" If ListVar1 = "Bold" Then SendKeys "^b" Wait 1 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: <Format> All
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.5 if ListVar1 = "Uppercase" then HeardWord "\all-caps","that" if ListVar1 = "Lowercase" then HeardWord "\no-caps","that" if ListVar1 = "Title Case" then HeardWord "\cap","that" if ListVar1 = "Title" then HeardWord "\cap","that" If ListVar1 = "Capitalize" Then HeardWord "\cap","that" if ListVar1 = "Italicize" then SendKeys "^i" if ListVar1 = "Italics" then SendKeys "^i" if ListVar1 = "Underline" then SendKeys "^u" if ListVar1 = "Bold" then SendKeys "^b" If ListVar1 = "Strikethrough" Then HeardWord "strikethrough","that" Wait .5 SendKeys "{Right}" End Sub

Command.name: Build A Command <dictation>
Command.description: Copies highlighted boilerplate text into a new Dragon command
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait .3 HeardWord "add","command" Wait 2 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 1 SendKeys "%o" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%l" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%v" End Sub

Command.name: Date Stamp
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys Format (Now, "mm-dd-yyyy") End Sub

Command.name: Start System Configuration
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Esc}" Wait 1 SendKeys "system configuration" SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 1 EmulateRecognition "click Startup" End Sub

Command.name: What Did I Say
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "show","recognition","history" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Up}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%u" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 EmulateRecognition "Read That" Wait 2 SendKeys "%c" End Sub

Command.name: Recognition History
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl EngineControl.DlgShow(dgndlgRecognitionHistory,0,,0) Wait 1 SendKeys "{Up}" Wait 4 SendKeys "%c" End Sub

Command.name: Open Users
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main AppBringUp "C:\ProgramData\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Users\" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "show Dictation Box" End Sub

Command.name: Add Brackets to <dictation>

Command.name: Sample Start <AppList>
Command.content: Sub Main Wait 0.1 If ListVar1 = "Access" Then ShellExecute "MSACCESS" If ListVar1 = "Auto Transcribe" Then HeardWord "Open","AutoTranscribe","Folder","Agent" If ListVar1 = "Calculator" Then ShellExecute "Calc" If ListVar1 = "Clock" Then ShellExecute "ms-clock:" If ListVar1 = "Computer" Then HeardWord "open","computer" If ListVar1 = "Defender" Then HeardWord "open","Windows","Defender" If ListVar1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "open","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Evernote" Then ShellExecute "Evernote" If ListVar1 = "Edge" Then HeardWord "open","Microsoft","Edge" If ListVar1 = "Excel" Then ShellExecute "EXCEL" If ListVar1 = "Explorer" Then ShellExecute "Explorer" If ListVar1 = "File Explorer" Then ShellExecute "Explorer" If ListVar1 = "Windows Explorer" Then ShellExecute "Explorer" If ListVar1 = "Firefox" Then ShellExecute "Firefox" If ListVar1 = "Front Page" Then ShellExecute "FRONTPG" If ListVar1 = "Google Chrome" Then ShellExecute "CHROME" If ListVar1 = "Internet Explorer" Then ShellExecute "IEXPLORE" If ListVar1 = "iTunes" Then AppBringUp "C:\Program Files\iTunes\iTunes.exe" If ListVar1 = "Malwarebytes" Then ShellExecute "mbam" If ListVar1 = "NaturallySpeaking" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Notepad" Then ShellExecute "Notepad" If ListVar1 = "One Note" Then ShellExecute "Onenote" If ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then ShellExecute "Outlook" If ListVar1 = "Paint" Then ShellExecute "MSPAINT" If ListVar1 = "PowerPoint" Then ShellExecute "PowerPNT" If ListVar1 = "Publisher" Then ShellExecute "MSPUB" If ListVar1 = "QuickBooks" Then ShellExecute "QBW32" If ListVar1 = "Run" Then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}r" If ListVar1 = "Sound" Then ShellExecute "SndVol" If ListVar1 = "System Properties" Then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}{Pause}" If ListVar1 = "Task Manager" Then SendKeys "^+{Esc}" If ListVar1 = "Word" Then ShellExecute "Winword" If ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then ShellExecute "Wordpad" If ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then ShellExecute "wpwin18" End Sub

Command.name: Code Application Argument One

Command.content: SendSystemKeys "{Alt+F4}"

Command.name: Check My E mail
Command.content: Sub Main AppSwapWith "Outlook" Wait 1 SendKeys "^y" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Home}inbox" Wait .1 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 1 SendKeys "{F9}" End Sub

Command.name: Close <AppList>
Command.description: Saves the Following document information to the clipboard and closes without saving
Command.content: Sub Main Wait 0.1 If ListVar1 = "Access" Then HeardWord "switch to ACCESS" If ListVar1 = "Act" Then HeardWord "switch to ACT" If ListVar1 = "AOL" Then HeardWord "switch to AOL" If ListVar1 = "Dialer" Then HeardWord "switch to Dialer" If ListVar1 = "Dragonpad" Then HeardWord "switch to Dragonpad" If ListVar1 = "Excel" Then HeardWord "switch to Excel" If ListVar1 = "Firefox" Then HeardWord "switch to Firefox" If ListVar1 = "Free Cell" Then HeardWord "switch to FREE CELL" If ListVar1 = "Front Page" Then HeardWord "switch to FRONT Page" If ListVar1 = "Google Chrome" Then HeardWord "switch to Google Chrome" If ListVar1 = "Groove" Then HeardWord "switch to GROOVE" If ListVar1 = "Info Path" Then HeardWord "switch to INFO PATH" If ListVar1 = "Internet Explorer" Then HeardWord "switch to Internet Explorer" If ListVar1 = "iTunes" Then HeardWord "switch to iTunes" If ListVar1 = "Microsoft Word" Then HeardWord "switch to Word" If ListVar1 = "Notepad" Then HeardWord "switch to Notepad" If ListVar1 = "One Note" Then HeardWord "switch to One Note" If ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then HeardWord "switch to Outlook" If ListVar1 = "Paint" Then EmulateRecognition "switch to paint" If ListVar1 = "Photo House" Then HeardWord "switch to Photo House" If ListVar1 = "Power Point" Then HeardWord "switch to Power Point" If ListVar1 = "Publisher" Then HeardWord "switch to Microsoft Publisher" If ListVar1 = "Snag It" Then HeardWord "switch to SnagIt Editor" If ListVar1 = "Sound Recorder" Then HeardWord "switch to sound recorder" If ListVar1 = "Word" Then HeardWord "switch to Word" If ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then HeardWord "switch to Wordpad" If ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch to WordPerfect" If ListVar1 = "Write" Then HeardWord "switch to Write" Wait 1.5 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 1 SendKeys "%n" End Sub

Command.name: Option <1to10>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}+{Enter 2}" Wait 1 if ListVar1 = "1" then SendKeys "Option #1" if ListVar1 = "2" then SendKeys "Option #2" if ListVar1 = "3" then SendKeys "Option #3" if ListVar1 = "4" then SendKeys "Option #4" if ListVar1 = "5" then SendKeys "Option #5" if ListVar1 = "6" then SendKeys "Option #6" if ListVar1 = "7" then SendKeys "Option #7" if ListVar1 = "8" then SendKeys "Option #8" if ListVar1 = "9" then SendKeys "Option #9" if ListVar1 = "10" then SendKeys "Option #10" SendKeys "+{Enter}" HeardWord "\cap" End Sub

Command.name: New Mouse Command <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools ' Script by Lindsay Adam, PCByVoice Ltd, www.pcbyvoice.com 2015 ' from an idea by Lunis Orcutt, KnowBrainer ' Please note there is no error handling and you may have to adjust the wait times ' at the end of the script when using SendKeys command
Type RECT Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type ' declare Win32 API functions Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetCursorPos" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long Declare Function GetWindowRect Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetWindowRect" (ByVal hwnd As Long, _ lpRect As RECT) As Long Declare Function GetForegroundWindow& Lib "user32" () Function GetWinCurPos(hwnd As Long) As POINTAPI Dim pt As POINTAPI Dim wRect As RECT Dim result As POINTAPI Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl GetCursorPos pt GetWindowRect hwnd, wRect result.x = pt.x - wRect.Left result.y = pt.y - wRect.Top GetWinCurPos = result End Function Sub Main
Dim hwnd As Long Dim result As POINTAPI Dim clip As String hwnd = GetForegroundWindow result = GetWinCurPos(hwnd) clip = "SetMousePosition 1," & result.x & _ "," & result.y
' Now complete the KnowBrainer command editor ' you may have to adjust the wait times below
'EmulateRecognition "New Application Command" HeardWord "Add","Application","Command" Wait 1 SendKeys "%n" Wait 0.2 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%t" Wait 0.2 SendKeys clip Wait 0.2 SendKeys "~Wait 0.1~" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "ButtonClick 1,1" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%v" End Sub

Type RECT Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type ' declare Win32 API functions Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetCursorPos" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long Declare Function GetWindowRect Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetWindowRect" (ByVal hwnd As Long, _ lpRect As RECT) As Long Declare Function GetForegroundWindow& Lib "user32" () Function GetWinCurPos(hwnd As Long) As POINTAPI Dim pt As POINTAPI Dim wRect As RECT Dim result As POINTAPI Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl GetCursorPos pt GetWindowRect hwnd, wRect result.x = pt.x - wRect.Left result.y = pt.y - wRect.Top GetWinCurPos = result End Function Sub Main

' Now complete the KnowBrainer command editor ' you may have to adjust the wait times below

Command.name: Sample Display Numbers <ComputerFolder>
Command.content: Sub Main Select Case ListVar1 Case "Current" HeardWord "DISPLAY numbers" Case "Desktop" ClearDesktop HeardWord "DISPLAY numbers" Case "Taskbar" SetMousePosition 0, 1832, 1073 Wait 0.1 ButtonClick 1, 1 Wait 0.1 HeardWord "DISPLAY numbers" Case "Start" SetMousePosition 0, 26, 1059 Wait 0.1 ButtonClick 1, 1 Wait 0.1 HeardWord "DISPLAY numbers" Case Else HeardWord "DISPLAY numbers" End Select End Sub

Command.name: Task View
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{WindowsHold}{Tab}" End Sub

Command.name: Sample Indent
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim currentLine, leadingCharacter, firstWord, splitted() As String Dim lineLength, numberSpaces, numberTabs, tabAsSpaces As Integer Dim foundWhiteSpace, convertTabsToSpaces, addExtraTab, removeTab As Boolean
tabAsSpaces = 3' get these from a .INI? SaveSetting GetSetting convertTabsToSpaces = true
SendKeys "{Home 2}", 1 SendKeys "+{End}", 1 Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^c", 1 Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{End}", 1 currentLine = Clipboard Wait 0.5 lineLength = Len(currentLine) If lineLength = 0 Then Exit All ' Personal choice - if I want to add blank lines I will do it by saying "Press Enter" If currentLine = "Sub Main" Then SendKeys "{Down}", 1 ' make the assumption that we're starting out with an empty command SendKeys "{Home}", 1 Wait 0.2 For iteration = 1 to tabAsSpaces SendKeys "{Space}", 1 Next iteration Exit All End If addExtraTab = false splitted = Split (currentLine, " ") firstWord = splitted(0) If firstWord = "Do" Or firstWord = "do" Or firstWord = "For" Or firstWord = "for" _ Or firstWord = "If" Or firstWord = "if" Or firstWord = "Else" Or firstWord = "else" _ Or firstWord = "Select" Or firstWord = "select" Or firstWord = "While" Or firstWord = "while" _ Or firstWord = "Type" Or firstWord = "type" Or firstWord = "Case" Or firstWord = "case" Then addExtraTab = true End If removeTab = false If firstWord = "End" Or firstWord = "end" Or firstWord = "Loop" Or firstWord = "loop" _ Or firstWord = "Next" Or firstWord = "next" Or firstWord = "Wend" Or firstWord = "wend" Then removeTab = true End If numberSpaces = 0 numberTabs = 0 For iteration = 1 to lineLength foundWhiteSpace = false leadingCharacter = Mid (currentLine, iteration, 1) If leadingCharacter = " " Then numberSpaces = numberSpaces + 1 foundWhiteSpace = true End If If leadingCharacter = Chr(9) Then numberTabs = numberTabs + 1 foundWhiteSpace = true End If If foundWhiteSpace = false Then Exit For Next iteration SendKeys "{ENTER}", 1 Wait 0.2 If numberSpaces > 0 Then For spaces = 1 to numberSpaces SendKeys "{Space}", 1 Next spaces End If If numberTabs > 0 Then For tabs = 1 to numberTabs If convertTabsToSpaces = false Then SendKeys "{Tab}", 1 Else For spaces = 1 to tabAsSpaces SendKeys "{Space}", 1 Next spaces End If Next tabs End If Wait 0.2 If convertTabsToSpaces = false Then SendKeys "{Tab}", 1 Else For spaces = 1 to tabAsSpaces SendKeys "{Space}", 1 Next spaces End If If addExtraTab = true Then If convertTabsToSpaces = false Then SendKeys "{Tab}", 1 Else For spaces = 1 to tabAsSpaces SendKeys "{Space}", 1 Next spaces End If End If If removeTab = true And addExtraTab = true Then If convertTabsToSpaces = false Then SendKeys "{Delete}", 1 Else For spaces = 1 to tabAsSpaces SendKeys "{Backspace}", 1 Next spaces End If End If End Sub

Command.name: Search <web>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^c" website = ListVar1 Wait 0.2 If website = "Ask" Then ShellExecute "http://www.ask.com/?o=0&l=dir" If website = "Bing" Then ShellExecute "http://www.bing.com/" If website = "Duck Duck" Then ShellExecute "https://duckduckgo.com/" If website = "Duck Duck Go" Then ShellExecute "https://duckduckgo.com/" If website = "eBay" Then ShellExecute "http://www.ebay.com/" If website = "Google" Then ShellExecute "http://www.google.com/" If website = "KnowBrainer" Then ShellExecute "http://www.knowbrainer.com/" If website = "no-brainer" Then ShellExecute "http://www.knowbrainer.com/" If website = "KnowBrainer Forum" Then ShellExecute "http://www.knowbrainer.com/forums/forum/search.cfm" If website = "no-brainer Forum" Then ShellExecute "http://www.knowbrainer.com/forums/forum/search.cfm" If website = "Nuance Knowledgebase" Then ShellExecute "http://nuance.custhelp.com/" If website = "Quick Tips" Then ShellExecute "http://www.knowbrainer.com/index.cfm/wiki/knowbrainer-quick-tips/" If website = "Wikipedia" Then ShellExecute "http://wikipedia.org/" If website = "Yahoo" Then ShellExecute "http://www.yahoo.com/" If website = "You Tube" Then ShellExecute "https://www.youtube.com/" If website = "Dictionary" Then ShellExecute "http://dictionary.reference.com/" If website = "Thesaurus" Then ShellExecute "http://www.thesaurus.com/" Wait 3 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.name: <keyname> Hold Down
Command.content:
' Script Lindsay Adam 2010 www.pcbyvoice.com ' Declare keyboard events Windows API function Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long ' declare virtual key constant for the left Windows key, ' control key, shift key and alt key Const VK_LWIN = &h5B Const VK_CTRL = &h11 Const VK_SHIFT = &h10 Const VK_ALT = &h12 Const VK_SPACE = &h20
Sub Main If ListVar1 = "WINDOWS Key" Then keybd_event(VK_LWIN,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "CONTROL Key" Then keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "SHIFT Key" Then keybd_event(VK_SHIFT,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "ALT Key" Then keybd_event(VK_ALT,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "SPACE Key" Then keybd_event(VK_SPACE,0,0,0) End Sub

Command.name: <keyname> Release
Command.content:
' Script Lindsay Adam 2010 www.pcbyvoice.com ' Declare keyboard events Windows API function Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long ' declare virtual key constant for the left Windows key, ' control key, shift key and alt key Const VK_LWIN = &h5B Const VK_CTRL = &h11 Const VK_SHIFT = &h10 Const VK_SPACE = &h20
Sub Main If ListVar1 = "WINDOWS Key" Then keybd_event(VK_LWIN,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "CONTROL Key" Then keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "SHIFT Key" Then keybd_event(VK_SHIFT,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "ALT Key" Then keybd_event(VK_ALT,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "SPACE Key" Then keybd_event(VK_SPACE,0,0,0) End Sub

Command.name: <Direction> Insert <dictation>
Command.description: Move in any direction, force dictation and press the spacebar
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Previous" Then SendKeys "{Left}" If ListVar1 = "Next" Then SendKeys "{Right}" If ListVar1 = "Tab" Then SendKeys "{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Shift Tab" Then SendKeys "+{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Back Tab" Then SendKeys "+{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys "{Left}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys "{Right}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "{Down}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "{Up}" If ListVar1 = "Space" Then SendKeys "{Space}" If ListVar1 = "Spacebar" Then SendKeys "{Space}" If ListVar1 = "Backspace" Then SendKeys "{Backspace}" origClip=Clipboard Wait 0.1 Clipboard ListVar2 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^v" End Sub

Command.name: Change All <dictation>
Command.description: Example: Say "Replace <dog> With <cat> to replace the last occurrence of the word "dog" with "cat"
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim newPhrase As String Dim phraseToReplace As String
On Error Resume Next 'Finds the location of the magic trigger word "with" which separates the phrase that needs to be replaced with the phrase that replaces it index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "to") 'This is the variable into which the phrase to be replaced goes phraseToReplace = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), 1, index - 2) 'This is the variable into which the new phrase goes newPhrase = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), index + 3, Len(CStr(ListVar1)) - index + 5) SendKeys "^a" 'Selects everything Wait 1 SendKeys "^c" 'Copies everything to the clipboard for processing Wait 2 testPhrase = Clipboard$() 'Dumps the clipboard into this variable newString = Replace$(testPhrase, phraseToReplace, newPhrase) 'Makes the replacement and places the corrected phrase in this variable Clipboard newString 'Places the corrected phrase in the clipboard for pasting in the next command below SendKeys "^v" Wait 1 SendKeys "{End}" 'Go back to the end of the document End End Sub

Command.name: Uppercase <dictation>
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking14\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim engCtrl As New DgnEngineControl engCtrl.Register engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("select " & ListVar1) engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("\all-caps that") Wait .5 engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("go back") engCtrl.UnRegister(False) End Sub

Command.name: Change <dictation>
Command.description: Example: Say "Change <dog> With <cat> to replace the last occurrence of the word "dog" with "cat"
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim newPhrase As String Dim phraseToReplace As String
On Error Resume Next 'Finds the location of the magic trigger word "with" which separates the phrase that needs to be replaced with the phrase that replaces it index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "to") 'This is the variable into which the phrase to be replaced goes phraseToReplace = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), 1, index - 2) 'This is the variable into which the new phrase goes newPhrase = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), index + 3, Len(CStr(ListVar1)) - index + 5) SendKeys "^+{Up}" 'Selects previous paragraph Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^c" 'Copies the selection to the clipboard for processing Wait 1.5 testPhrase = Clipboard$() 'Dumps the clipboard into this variable newString = Replace$(testPhrase, phraseToReplace, newPhrase) 'Makes the replacement and places the corrected phrase in this variable Clipboard newString 'Places the corrected phrase in the clipboard for pasting in the next command below SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{End}" 'Go back to the end of the current paragraph End End Sub

Command.name: Save Close And Minimize
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^s" Wait 1 SendKeys "%fc" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%{Space}n" End Sub

Command.name: Code SendKeys Shift <Keys>

Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "EDIT Selected Command" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "EDIT Selected Command" End Sub

Command.name: MouseWindow Sample Command
Command.description: Produces MouseGrid Window 1, 3, 9, 2 and a Left Click
Command.content: MouseGrid 2,1 MouseGrid 1,3 MouseGrid 1,9 MouseGrid 1,2 Wait 100 ButtonClick 1,1

Command.name: MouseGrid Sample Command
Command.description: Produces MouseGrid Screen 1, 3, 9, 2 and a Left Click
Command.content: MouseGrid 1,1 MouseGrid 1,3 MouseGrid 1,9 MouseGrid 1,2 Wait 100 ButtonClick 1,1

Command.name: Open <files>
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Document 1" Then SendKeys "%fr1" If ListVar1 = "Document 2" Then SendKeys "%fr2" If ListVar1 = "Document 3" Then SendKeys "%fr3" If ListVar1 = "Document 4" Then SendKeys "%fr4" If ListVar1 = "Ereg" Then AppBringUp "C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Ereg\Ereg.ini " If ListVar1 = "File 1" Then SendKeys "%fr1" If ListVar1 = "File 2" Then SendKeys "%fr2" If ListVar1 = "File 3" Then SendKeys "%fr3" If ListVar1 = "File 4" Then SendKeys "%fr4" If ListVar1 = "General" Then AppBringUp "C:\ProgramData\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Data\enx\dvcu\general" If ListVar1 = "System" Then AppBringUp "C:\ProgramData\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Data\enx\dvcu\general\system.dvc" If ListVar1 = "KnowBrainer" Then AppBringUp "C:\Program Files (x86)\KnowBrainer\KnowBrainer Professional 2017" If ListVar1 = "KnowBrainer Manual" Then ShellExecute "http://www.knowbrainer.com/downloads/KnowBrainer2017_Manual.PDF" If ListVar1 = "Quick Tips" Then ShellExecute "http://www.knowbrainer.com/index.cfm/wiki/knowbrainer-quick-tips/ " If ListVar1 = "Program Files" Then AppBringUp "C:\Program Files (x86)\" If ListVar1 = "Users" Then AppBringUp "C:\ProgramData\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Users" If ListVar1 = "KnowBrainer Tweaks" Then ShellExecute "http://knowbrainer.com/index.cfm/wiki/knowbrainer-tweaks/" End Sub

Command.name: Go Fill <1to50> <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^f" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "["+ListVar1+"]" Wait .5 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys ListVar2 End Sub

Command.name: Go Fill <1to10> <dictation>
Command.description: Simultaneously select a bookmark and dictate
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^f" Wait 0.3 If ListVar1 = "1" Then SendKeys "[01]" If ListVar1 = "2" Then SendKeys "[02]" If ListVar1 = "3" Then SendKeys "[03]" If ListVar1 = "4" Then SendKeys "[04]" If ListVar1 = "5" Then SendKeys "[05]" If ListVar1 = "6" Then SendKeys "[06]" If ListVar1 = "7" Then SendKeys "[07]" If ListVar1 = "8" Then SendKeys "[08]" If ListVar1 = "9" Then SendKeys "[09]" Wait .5 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys ListVar2 End Sub

Command.name: Go Uppercase <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^f" Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "\all-caps that" Wait 1 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: Go Lowercase <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^f" Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "\no-caps that" Wait 1 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: Go Title Case <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^f" Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "\cap that" Wait 1 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: Search Amazon for <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main ShellExecute "https://www.amazon.com/s?field-keywords=~" Wait 3 SendKeys "%d" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Right}{Backspace}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 1 SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.name: Notepad Paragraph
Command.description: Copies current paragraph to Notepad
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Up}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^+{Down}+{Left}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.1 AppBringUp "C:\WINDOWS\system32\notepad.exe" Wait 1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^a" End Sub

Command.name: Notepad All
Command.description: Copies everything to Notepad
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.1 AppBringUp "C:\WINDOWS\system32\notepad.exe" Wait 1 SendKeys "^v" End Sub

Command.name: Notepad <NextOrPrevious> <1to20> Paragraphs
Command.description: Copies current paragraph to Notepad
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Previous" then SendKeys "^+{Up "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Next" then SendKeys "^+{Down "+ListVar2+"}+{Left}" if ListVar1 = "Up" then SendKeys "^+{Up "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Down" then SendKeys "^+{Down "+ListVar2+"}+{Left}" if ListVar1 = "Back" then SendKeys "^+{Up "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Forward" then SendKeys "^+{Down "+ListVar2+"}+{Left}" if ListVar1 = "Last" then SendKeys "^+{Up "+ListVar2+"}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.1 AppBringUp "C:\WINDOWS\system32\notepad.exe" Wait 1 SendKeys "^v" End Sub

Command.name: D Box All
Command.description: Opens Dragon Dictation Box and simultaneously excepts dictation
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.2 EmulateRecognition "show Dictation Box" Wait 0.3 origClip=Clipboard Wait 0.1 Clipboard ListVar1 End Sub

Command.name: D Box Paragraph
Command.description: Opens Dragon Dictation Box and simultaneously excepts dictation
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Up}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^+{Down}+{Left}" Wait 0.2 EmulateRecognition "show Dictation Box" Wait 0.3 origClip=Clipboard Wait 0.1 Clipboard ListVar1 End Sub

Command.name: D Box <NextOrPrevious> Paragraph
Command.description: Opens Dragon Dictation Box and simultaneously excepts dictation
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Previous" Then SendKeys "^+{Up "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Next" Then SendKeys "^+{Down "+ListVar2+"}+{Left}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "^+{Up "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "^+{Down "+ListVar2+"}+{Left}" If ListVar1 = "Back" Then SendKeys "^+{Up "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Forward" Then SendKeys "^+{Down "+ListVar2+"}+{Left}" If ListVar1 = "Last" Then SendKeys "^+{Up "+ListVar2+"}" Wait 0.2 EmulateRecognition "show Dictation Box" Wait 0.3 origClip=Clipboard Wait 0.1 Clipboard ListVar1 End Sub

Command.name: D Box <NextOrPrevious> <1to20> Paragraphs
Command.description: Opens Dragon Dictation Box and simultaneously excepts dictation
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Previous" Then SendKeys "^+{Up "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Next" Then SendKeys "^+{Down "+ListVar2+"}+{Left}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "^+{Up "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "^+{Down "+ListVar2+"}+{Left}" If ListVar1 = "Back" Then SendKeys "^+{Up "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Forward" Then SendKeys "^+{Down "+ListVar2+"}+{Left}" If ListVar1 = "Last" Then SendKeys "^+{Up "+ListVar2+"}" Wait 0.2 EmulateRecognition "show Dictation Box" Wait 0.3 origClip=Clipboard Wait 0.1 Clipboard ListVar1 End Sub

Command.name: Notepad <NextOrPrevious> Paragraph
Command.description: Copies current paragraph to Notepad
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Previous" then SendKeys "^+{Up}" if ListVar1 = "Next" then SendKeys "^+{Down}+{Left}" if ListVar1 = "Back" then SendKeys "^+{Up}" if ListVar1 = "Forward" then SendKeys "^+{Down}+{Left}" if ListVar1 = "Last" then SendKeys "^+{Up}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.1 AppBringUp "C:\WINDOWS\system32\notepad.exe" Wait 1 SendKeys "^v" End Sub

Command.name: Code Wake Up
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "WakeUp" End Sub

Command.name: Code Wake Up Save
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "WakeUp" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%v" End Sub

Command.name: Code Loop Variable
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "For i = 1 To {(}ListVar1" SendKeys "{)}" SendKeys "~" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "Next{Up}{End} " End Sub

Command.name: <1st_9th> Tab
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "first" then SendKeys "^1" if ListVar1 = "second" then SendKeys "^2" if ListVar1 = "third" then SendKeys "^3" if ListVar1 = "fourth" then SendKeys "^4" if ListVar1 = "fifth" then SendKeys "^5" if ListVar1 = "sixth" then SendKeys "^6" if ListVar1 = "seventh" then SendKeys "^7" if ListVar1 = "eighth" then SendKeys "^8" if ListVar1 = "ninth" then SendKeys "^9" End Sub

Command.name: Go To <website>
Command.content: Sub Main website = ListVar1 Wait 0.01 If website = "Dropbox" Then ShellExecute "https://www.dropbox.com/" If website = "KnowBrainer Forum" Then ShellExecute "http://knowbrainer.com/forums/forum/index.cfm" If website = "Home Page" Then SendKeys "%vgh" If website = "Home Shopping Club" Then ShellExecute "www.css.isn.com/" If website = "KnowBrainer" Then ShellExecute "www.knowbrainer.com/" If website = "no-brainer" Then ShellExecute "www.knowbrainer.com/" If website = "Microsoft" Then ShellExecute "www.microsoft.com/" If website = "eBay" Then ShellExecute "www.ebay.com/" If website = "QVC" Then ShellExecute "www.qvc.com/" If website = "Amazon" Then ShellExecute "http://www.amazon.com" If website = "see net" Then ShellExecute "www.search.com/" If website = "Yahoo" Then ShellExecute "www.yahoo.com/" If website = "Map Quest" Then ShellExecute "www.mapquest.com/" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main value = CInt (ListVar2) If value > 99 Then For i = 1 To value/50 If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys"{Left 50}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys"{Right 50}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys"{Up 50}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys"{Down 50}" Next Else If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys "{Left "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys "{Right "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "{Up "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "{Down "+ListVar2+"}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "~" End If End Sub

Command.content: Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long ' declare virtual key constant for Escape and Control keys Const VK_CTRL = &H11 Const VK_ESC = &H1B Sub Main keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) keybd_event(VK_ESC,0,0,0) keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,2,0) keybd_event(VK_ESC,0,2,0) Wait 0.2 SendKeys ListVar1 End Sub

Command.name: Replace All <dictation>
Command.description: Example: Say "Replace All <dog> With <cat> to replace all occurrences of the word "dog" with "cat"
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim newPhrase As String Dim phraseToReplace As String
On Error Resume Next 'Finds the location of the magic trigger word "with" which separates the phrase that needs to be replaced with the phrase that replaces it index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "with") 'This is the variable into which the phrase to be replaced goes phraseToReplace = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), 1, index - 2) 'This is the variable into which the new phrase goes newPhrase = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), index + 5, Len(CStr(ListVar1)) - index + 5) SendKeys "^a" 'Selects everything Wait 1.5 SendKeys "^c" 'Copies the selection to the clipboard for processing Wait 2.5 testPhrase = Clipboard$() 'Dumps the clipboard into this variable newString = Replace$(testPhrase, phraseToReplace, newPhrase) 'Makes the replacement and places the corrected phrase in this variable Clipboard newString 'Places the corrected phrase in the clipboard for pasting in the next command below SendKeys "^v" Wait 1 SendKeys "{End}" 'Go back to the bottom of the document to continue dictating End End Sub

Command.name: <Direction> <1to20> Insert <dictation>
Command.description: Move in any direction 1 to 20 times, force dictation and press the spacebar
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Previous" Then SendKeys "{Left "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Next" Then SendKeys "{Right "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Tab" Then SendKeys "{Tab "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Shift Tab" Then SendKeys "+{Tab "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Back Tab" Then SendKeys "+{Tab "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys "{Left "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys "{Right "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "{Down "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "{Up "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Space" Then SendKeys "{Space}" If ListVar1 = "Spacebar" Then SendKeys "{Space}" If ListVar1 = "Backspace" Then SendKeys "{Backspace}" origClip=Clipboard Wait 0.1 Clipboard ListVar3 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^v" End Sub

Command.name: System Information
Command.description: Contributed by Mr
Command.content: '#Reference #Microsoft.VisualBasic, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a, processorArchitecture=MSIL '#Reference #System.Management, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a, processorArchitecture=MSIL '#Language "WWB.NET" 'Example script by RWilke Imports System.Management Imports Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices Function GetCPUInfo() As String Dim strCPUInfo As String = String.Empty() Dim query As New SelectQuery( "Win32_Processor" ) Dim search As New ManagementObjectSearcher( query ) Dim info As ManagementObject For Each info In search.Get() strCPUInfo += "CPU:" + vbTab + vbTab + info( "Name" ) + vbCrLf strCPUInfo += "Cores / Threads:" + vbTab + info( "NumberOfCores" ) + " / " + info( "NumberOfLogicalProcessors" ) + vbCrLf strCPUInfo += "Cache:" + vbTab + vbTab + info( "L2CacheSize" ) + " KB L2 / " + info( "L3CacheSize" ) + " KB L3" + vbCrLf Next Return strCPUInfo End Function Function GetComputerInfo() As String Dim computerInfo As New Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Computer Dim strComputerInfo As String = String.Empty() Dim lTotalMem As Long = computerInfo.Info.TotalPhysicalMemory / (1024*1024) Dim lAvailableMem As Long = computerInfo.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory / (1024*1024) strComputerInfo += "Physical Memory:" + vbTab + lTotalMem.ToString() + " GB Total" _ + " / " + lAvailableMem.ToString() + " GB Available" + " / " _ + (Round(100-(100/lTotalMem*lAvailableMem))).ToString()+ " % Used" + vbCrLf strComputerInfo += "Operating System:" + vbTab + computerInfo.Info.OSFullName + vbCrLf strComputerInfo += "OS Platform:" + vbTab + computerInfo.Info.OSPlatform + vbCrLf strComputerInfo += "OS Version:" + vbTab + computerInfo.Info.OSVersion + vbCrLf strComputerInfo += "OS Language:" + vbTab + computerInfo.Info.InstalledUICulture.ToString() + vbCrLf Return strComputerInfo End Function Sub Main Dim s As String = String.Empty() s += GetCPUInfo() s += GetComputerInfo() s += vbCrLf + vbCrLf + "Click Yes to save to a file, click No to quit" + vbCrLf If MsgBox( s, vbYesNo ) = vbYes Then Dim saveFileDialog As New Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog() saveFileDialog.Filter = "txt files (*.txt)|*.txt" saveFileDialog.ShowDialog() System.IO.File.WriteAllText(saveFileDialog.FileName, GetCPUInfo & GetComputerInfo ()) End If End Sub

Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl EngineControl.DlgShow(dgndlgOptions,0,,0) Wait 1 if ListVar1 = "Correction" then SendKeys "" if ListVar1 = "Commands" then HeardWord "click","commands" if ListVar1 = "View" then HeardWord "click","view" if ListVar1 = "Appearance" then HeardWord "click","appearance" if ListVar1 = "Hotkeys" then HeardWord "click","hot keys" if ListVar1 = "Text-to-Speech" then HeardWord "click","playback" if ListVar1 = "Playback" then HeardWord "click","playback" if ListVar1 = "Miscellaneous" then HeardWord "click","miscellaneous" if ListVar1 = "Data" then HeardWord "click","data" if ListVar1 = "Dictation Box" then HeardWord "click dictation box" if ListVar1 = "Dragon Anywhere" then HeardWord "click","Dragon Anywhere" if ListVar1 = "Upgrade To Legal" then HeardWord "click","Upgrade","To","Legal" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Tab}" End Sub

Command.name: <Format>
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Uppercase" Then HeardWord "\all-caps","that" If ListVar1 = "Lowercase" Then HeardWord "\no-caps","that" If ListVar1 = "Title Case" Then HeardWord "\cap","that" If ListVar1 = "Title" Then HeardWord "\cap","that" If ListVar1 = "Capitalize" Then HeardWord "\cap","that" If ListVar1 = "Italicize" Then SendKeys "^i" If ListVar1 = "Italics" Then SendKeys "^i" If ListVar1 = "Underline" Then SendKeys "^u" If ListVar1 = "Bold" Then SendKeys "^b" If ListVar1 = "Strikethrough" Then HeardWord "strikethrough","that" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Right}" End Sub

Command.name: D Box <dictation>
Command.description: Opens Dragon Dictation Box and simultaneously excepts dictation
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "start Dictation Box" Wait 1 SendKeys ListVar1 End Sub

Command.name: Double List <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "+{Enter 2}"+ListVar1+". " Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{End}" End Sub

Command.name: List <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "+{Enter}"+ListVar1+". " Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{End}" End Sub

Command.name: List <Lett>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}+{Enter}{(}" If ListVar1="a" then SendKeys "A." If ListVar1="be" then SendKeys "B." If ListVar1="see" then SendKeys "C." If ListVar1="Dee" then SendKeys "D." If ListVar1="E." then SendKeys "E." If ListVar1="F." then SendKeys "F." If ListVar1="gee" then SendKeys "G." If ListVar1="H." then SendKeys "H." If ListVar1="I" then SendKeys "I." If ListVar1="Jay" then SendKeys "J." If ListVar1="Kay" then SendKeys "K." If ListVar1="L." then SendKeys "L." If ListVar1="M." then SendKeys "M." If ListVar1="N." then SendKeys "N." If ListVar1="oh" then SendKeys "O." If ListVar1="pee" then SendKeys "P." If ListVar1="cue" then SendKeys "Q." If ListVar1="are" then SendKeys "R." If ListVar1="S." then SendKeys "S." If ListVar1="tea" then SendKeys "T." If ListVar1="you" then SendKeys "U." If ListVar1="V." then SendKeys "V." If ListVar1="W." then SendKeys "W." If ListVar1="X." then SendKeys "X." If ListVar1="why" then SendKeys "Y." If ListVar1="Z." then SendKeys "Z." SendKeys "{)}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{End}" End Sub

Command.name: List Bullet
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "+{Enter}" Wait 0.3 EmulateRecognition "•" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "{End}" Wait 0.1 HeardWord "\cap" End Sub

Command.name: Go Capitalize <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^f" Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "\cap that" Wait 1 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: Save User
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "save","user","profile" End Sub

Command.name: Google That
Command.description: Say "Google KnowBrainer" to open a new tab, in your browser and seach the KnowBrainer site
Command.content: SendSystemKeys "{Ctrl+c}" Wait 200 ShellExecute "http://www.google.com/" Wait 3000 SendSystemKeys "{Ctrl+v}" Wait 500 SendSystemKeys "{Enter}"

Command.name: Date and Time Stamp
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys( Format(Now, "mm/dd/yy") + Space(1) + "-" + Space(1) + Format(Now, "hh:mmAM/PM") ) End Sub

Command.name: What Time Is It
Command.content: Sub Main MsgBox( Format(Now, "mm/dd/yy") + " - " + Format(Now, "hh:mmAM/PM") ) End Sub

Command.name: Letters <myalphabet> <myalphabet> <myalphabet> <myalphabet>
Command.content: Sub Main t1 = Mid$(ListVar1,1,InStr(ListVar1, "\")-1) t2 = Mid$(ListVar2,1,InStr(ListVar2, "\")-1) t3 = Mid$(ListVar3,1,InStr(ListVar3, "\")-1) t4 = Mid$(ListVar4,1,InStr(ListVar4, "\")-1) if t1 = "backslash" Then t1 = "\" if t2 = "backslash" Then t2 = "\" if t3 = "backslash" Then t3 = "\" if t4 = "backslash" Then t4 = "\" if t1 = "space" Then t1 = " " if t2 = "space" Then t2 = " " if t3 = "space" Then t3 = " " if t4 = "space" Then t4 = " " SendKeys t1+t2+t3+t4 End Sub

Command.name: Letters <myalphabet> <myalphabet>
Command.content: Sub Main t1 = Mid$(ListVar1,1,InStr(ListVar1, "\")-1) t2 = Mid$(ListVar2,1,InStr(ListVar2, "\")-1) if t1 = "backslash" Then t1 = "\" if t2 = "backslash" Then t2 = "\" if t1 = "space" Then t1 = " " if t2 = "space" Then t2 = " " SendKeys t1+t2 End Sub

Command.name: Search Quick Tips for <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main ShellExecute "http://www.knowbrainer.com/index.cfm/wiki/knowbrainer-quick-tips/ " Wait 3 SendKeys "^f" Wait 0.5 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.5 SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.name: Delete to End of <Section>
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Line" then SendKeys "+{End}" if ListVar1 = "Paragraph" then SendKeys "^+{Down}" if ListVar1 = "Document" then SendKeys "^+{End}" SendKeys "{Del}" End Sub

Command.name: Switch To <AppList>
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Edge" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Edge" If ListVar1 = "Auto Transcribe" Then HeardWord "switch","AutoTranscribe","Folder","Agent" If ListVar1 = "Next Window" Then SendKeys "%{Esc}" If ListVar1 = "Next Desktop" Then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}^{Right}" If ListVar1 = "Other Window" Then SendKeys "%{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Previous Window" Then SendKeys "%+{Esc}" If ListVar1 = "Previous Desktop" Then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}^{Left}" End Sub

Command.name: Continue <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End} " Wait 0.3 origClip=Clipboard Wait 0.1 Clipboard ListVar1 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys " " End Sub

Command.name: Bottom <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{End} " Wait 0.3 origClip=Clipboard Wait 0.1 Clipboard ListVar1 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys " " End Sub

Command.name: Begin <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Home}" Wait 0.3 origClip=Clipboard Wait 0.1 Clipboard ListVar1 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys " " End Sub

Command.name: close return
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{F4}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{Tab}" End Sub

Command.name: close window
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%{F4}" End Sub

Command.name: code string <dictation>
Command.content:
Sub Main
SendKeys """" & ListVar1 & """"
End Sub

Command.name: Copy All To <AppList_2>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\apps.bas"
Sub Main SendKeys "^a^c" Wait 0.2 dim number as string number = getAppNumber(ListVar1) if number <> "" then goToApp(ListVar1) else if ListVar1 = "Access" Then AppBringUp "MSAccess" if ListVar1 = "Excel" Then AppBringUp "Excel" if ListVar1 = "Google Chrome" Then AppBringUp "chrome" if ListVar1 = "Firefox" Then AppBringUp "firefox" if ListVar1 = "Internet Explorer" Then AppBringUp "iexplore" if ListVar1 = "Dragon" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" if ListVar1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" if ListVar1 = "Dragonpad" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" if ListVar1 = "Next Window" Then SendKeys "%{Esc}" if ListVar1 = "Previous Window" Then SendKeys "%+{Esc}" if ListVar1 = "Other Window" Then SendKeys "%{Tab}" if ListVar1 = "Notepad" Then AppBringUp "Notepad" if ListVar1 = "One Note" Then AppBringUp "onenote" if ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then AppBringUp "Outlook" if ListVar1 = "Paint" Then AppBringUp "mspaint" if ListVar1 = "Microsoft Paint" Then AppBringUp "mspaint" if ListVar1 = "PowerPoint" Then AppBringUp "PowerPnt" if ListVar1 = "Skype" Then AppBringUp "Skype" if ListVar1 = "Word" Then AppBringUp "WinWord" if ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then AppBringUp "WordPad" if ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch","to","WordPerfect" end if Wait 2 SendKeys "^{v}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Right}" End Sub

Command.name: Copy All To <AppList_2> Back
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\apps.bas"
Sub Main SendKeys "^a^c" Wait 0.2 dim number as string number = getAppNumber(ListVar1) if number <> "" then goToApp(ListVar1) else if ListVar1 = "Access" Then AppBringUp "MSAccess" if ListVar1 = "Excel" Then AppBringUp "Excel" if ListVar1 = "Google Chrome" Then AppBringUp "chrome" if ListVar1 = "Firefox" Then AppBringUp "firefox" if ListVar1 = "Internet Explorer" Then AppBringUp "iexplore" if ListVar1 = "Dragon" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" if ListVar1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" if ListVar1 = "DragonPad" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" if ListVar1 = "Next Window" Then SendKeys "%{Esc}" if ListVar1 = "Previous Window" Then SendKeys "%+{Esc}" if ListVar1 = "Other Window" Then SendKeys "%{Tab}" if ListVar1 = "Notepad" Then AppBringUp "Notepad" if ListVar1 = "One Note" Then AppBringUp "onenote" if ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then AppBringUp "Outlook" if ListVar1 = "Paint" Then AppBringUp "mspaint" if ListVar1 = "Microsoft Paint" Then AppBringUp "mspaint" if ListVar1 = "PowerPoint" Then AppBringUp "PowerPnt" if ListVar1 = "Skype" Then AppBringUp "Skype" if ListVar1 = "Word" Then AppBringUp "WinWord" if ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then AppBringUp "WordPad" if ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch","to","WordPerfect" end if Wait 1 SendKeys "^{v}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Right}" SendKeys "%{Tab}"
End Sub

Command.name: copy Chrome URL
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\apps.bas"
Sub Main goToApp "chrome" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%d" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^c%{Tab}" End Sub

Command.name: Copy Line
Command.content: Sub Main 'SendKeys "{Home}+{End}^c{Right}" SendKeys "{Home}+{End}^c" End Sub

Command.name: IP <1to300> dot <1to300> dot <1to300> dot <1to300>
Command.content:
Sub Main dim octet1, octet2, octet3, octet4 as Integer octet1 = int(ListVar1) octet2 = int(ListVar2) octet3 = int(ListVar3) octet4 = int(ListVar4)
dim ip as String ip = ListVar1 & "." & ListVar2 & "." & ListVar3 & "." & ListVar4
if octet1 > 255 or octet2 > 255 or octet3 > 255 or octet4 > 255 then MsgBox "Invalid IP Address: " & ip exit Sub end if
SendKeys ip End Sub

Command.name: Send E-mail To <dictation>
Command.content: HeardWord "switch","to","Outlook" Wait 2000 SendSystemKeys "{Ctrl+Shift+m}" Wait 750 SendKeys _arg1 Wait 750 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 500 SendKeys "{Alt+u}" Wait 4000 SendKeys "{Ctrl+a}" Wait 400 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 600 SendKeys "{Tab}" Wait 200 SendKeys "{Ctrl+Home}"

Command.name: skype answer call
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\apps.bas"
Sub Main goToApp "skype" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^+8" SetMicrophone 0 End Sub

Command.name: Delete to <Section> end
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Line" then SendKeys "+{End}" if ListVar1 = "Paragraph" then SendKeys "^+{Down}" if ListVar1 = "Document" then SendKeys "^+{End}" SendKeys "{Del}" End Sub

Command.name: Delete to Beginning of <Section>

Command.name: Replace <dictation>
Command.description: Say "Replace <dictation> with <dictation>" to use this command
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim newPhrase As String Dim phraseToReplace As String
On Error Resume Next 'Finds the location of the magic trigger word "with" which separates the phrase that needs to be replaced with the phrase that replaces it index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "with") 'This is the variable into which the phrase to be replaced goes phraseToReplace = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), 1, index - 2) 'This is the variable into which the new phrase goes newPhrase = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), index + 5, Len(CStr(ListVar1)) - index + 5) SendKeys "^+{Up}" 'Selects previous paragraph Wait 0.75 SendKeys "^c" 'Copies the selection to the clipboard for processing 'Wait 2.5 Wait 1 testPhrase = Clipboard$() 'Dumps the clipboard into this variable newString = Replace$(testPhrase, phraseToReplace, newPhrase) 'Makes the replacement and places the corrected phrase in this variable Clipboard newString 'Places the corrected phrase in the clipboard for pasting in the next command below SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.75 SendKeys "{End}" 'Go back to the end of the current paragraph End End Sub

Command.name: New Application Mouse Command <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools ' Script by Lindsay Adam, PCByVoice Ltd, www.pcbyvoice.com 2015 ' from an idea by Lunis Orcutt, KnowBrainer ' Please note there is no error handling and you may have to adjust the wait times ' at the end of the script when using SendKeys command
Type RECT Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type ' declare Win32 API functions Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetCursorPos" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long Declare Function GetWindowRect Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetWindowRect" (ByVal hwnd As Long, _ lpRect As RECT) As Long Declare Function GetForegroundWindow& Lib "user32" () Function GetWinCurPos(hwnd As Long) As POINTAPI Dim pt As POINTAPI Dim wRect As RECT Dim result As POINTAPI Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl GetCursorPos pt GetWindowRect hwnd, wRect result.x = pt.x - wRect.Left result.y = pt.y - wRect.Top GetWinCurPos = result End Function Sub Main
Dim hwnd As Long Dim result As POINTAPI Dim clip As String hwnd = GetForegroundWindow result = GetWinCurPos(hwnd) clip = "SetMousePosition 1," & result.x & _ "," & result.y
' Now complete the KnowBrainer command editor ' you may have to adjust the wait times below
'EmulateRecognition "New Application Command" HeardWord "New", "Application", "Command" Wait 1 SendKeys "%n" Wait 0.2 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%t" Wait 0.2 SendKeys clip Wait 0.2 SendKeys "~Wait 0.1~" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "ButtonClick 1,1" Wait 0.2 'SendKeys "%v" End Sub

Command.name: set <Formatting> <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\utilities.bas"
Sub Main
' Get working text dim saveClipboard as String saveClipboard = Clipboard
SendKeys "{Home}+{End}^c" Wait 0.1 dim fullText as String fulltext = Clipboard
' Get insertion point dim index as Integer index = InStr(LCase(fullText), LCase(ListVar2)) if index = 0 then SendKeys "{Right}" exit sub end if
dim out as String out = out & Left(fullText, index - 1)
select case ListVar1 case "Cap", "Caps", "Capitals", "Initial Caps" out = out & CapitalizeString(ListVar2) case "All-caps", "Uppercase" out = out & UCase$(ListVar2) case "No-Caps", "Lowercase" out = out & LCase$(ListVar2) case else out = out & ListVar2 end select
out = out & Mid$(fullText, index + Len(ListVar2)) Clipboard(out) Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^v{Right}" Wait 0.1 Clipboard(saveClipboard) End Sub

Command.name: <MouseButton_MouseAction>
Command.content: 'Script by Lindsay Adam www.pcbyvoice.com 2011 Private Declare Sub mouse_event Lib "user32" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, _ ByVal dx As Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, _ ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) Sub Main If ListVar1 = "LEFT Mouse Hold Down" or ListVar1 = "mouse down" then mouse_event (2, 0,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "LEFT Mouse Release" or ListVar1 = "mouse up" then mouse_event (4, 0,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "RIGHT Mouse Hold Down" then mouse_event (8, 0,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "RIGHT Mouse Release" then mouse_event (16, 0,0,0,0) End Sub

Command.name: scroll <Direction> <1to1000>
Command.description: Special Thanks To Mr Wilkie for this script
Command.content: Declare Function mouse_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, ByVal dx As _ Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) As Long Const WHEEL_DELTA = 120 Const MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL = &H800 'Courtesy of Mike Jerry Sub Main Select Case ListVar1 Case "Up" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) Case "Down" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, -WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) Case "Right" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_HWHEEL, 0, 0, WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) Case "Left" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_HWHEEL, 0, 0, -WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) End Select End Sub

Command.name: get mouse position relative to <compass_corners>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\mouse.bas"
Sub Main
dim relativex as Long dim relativey as Long dim cornerStr as string
select case ListVar1 case "Northwest" GetMousePositionRelativeToActiveWindow(WindowCorner.NW, relativex, relativey) cornerStr = "WindowCorner.NW"
case "Northeast" GetMousePositionRelativeToActiveWindow(WindowCorner.NE, relativex, relativey) cornerStr = "WindowCorner.NE"
case "Southwest" GetMousePositionRelativeToActiveWindow(WindowCorner.SW, relativex, relativey) cornerStr = "WindowCorner.SW"
case "Southeast" GetMousePositionRelativeToActiveWindow(WindowCorner.SE, relativex, relativey) cornerStr = "WindowCorner.SE"
case else Msgbox "Unknown compass direction." exit Sub end select
clip = "'#Uses ""C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\mouse.bas""" & vbcrlf & vbcrlf & _ "Sub Main" & vbcrlf & _ "PositionMouseRelativeToActiveWindow(" & cornerStr & ", " & relativex & " ," & relativey & ")" & vbcrlf & _ "Wait .5" & vbcrlf & _ "ButtonClick 1,1" & vbcrlf & _ "End Sub" & vbcrlf
Clipboard clip TTSPlayString "mouse position is ready to be pasted"
End Sub

'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\window.bas"
Sub Main 'SendKeys "%{Space}" 'Wait 0.5 'SendKeys "s" 'Wait 0.5 'if ListVar1 = "Larger" then SendKeys "{Right 10}{Down 10}" 'if ListVar1 = "Much Larger" then SendKeys "{Right 25}{Down 25}" 'if ListVar1 = "Smaller" then SendKeys "{Right}{Left 10}{Down}{Up 10}" 'if ListVar1 = "Much Smaller" then SendKeys "{Right}{Left 25}{Down}{Up 25}" 'Wait 0.3 'SendKeys "{Enter}"
if ListVar1 = "expand" or ListVar1 = "grow" then ResizeActiveWindow(True, 100, 100) 'if ListVar1 = "Much Larger" then ResizeActiveWindow(True, 250, 250) if ListVar1 = "shrink" then ResizeActiveWindow(False, 100, 100) 'if ListVar1 = "Much Smaller" then ResizeActiveWindow(False, 250, 250)
End Sub

if ListVar1 = "expand" or ListVar1 = "grow" then ResizeActiveWindow(True, ListVar2, ListVar2) if ListVar1 = "shrink" then ResizeActiveWindow(False, ListVar2, ListVar2) 'if ListVar1 = "Much Larger" then ResizeActiveWindow(True, 250, 250)
