Command.name: Calculate original <dictation>
Command.description: Thanks to Mike Jerry for this command
Command.content:
Sub Main
Dim operator As String Dim firstnum As String Dim secondnum As String Dim result As String
If InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "+") Then operator = "Plus" index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "+") End If
If InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "-") Then operator = "Minus" index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "-") End If
If InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "×") Then operator = "Times" index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "×") End If
If InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "÷") Then operator = "Divided By" index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "÷") End If
ShellExecute "Calc" Wait 1 'Separate out the numbers firstnum = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), 1, index - 1) secondnum = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), index + 1, Len(CStr(ListVar1)) - index + 1) 'Strip out any commas from the numbers 'cuz Calculator don't like 'em firstnum = Replace$(firstnum, ",", "") secondnum = Replace$(secondnum, ",", "") SendKeys firstnum Wait 0.1 If operator = "Plus" Then SendKeys "{+}" If operator = "Minus" Then SendKeys "-" If operator = "Divided By" Then SendKeys "/" If operator = "Times" Then SendKeys "{*}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys secondnum Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 0.2 'Now to format the result to limit decimal places to two digits and add commas every three digits to large numbers result = Clipboard 'If both decimal and integer > 3 If InStr(CStr(result), ".") And Len(CStr(result)) > 3 Then result = Format( result , "#,0.##" ) GoTo Finish End If 'If decimal only If InStr(CStr(result), ".") Then result = Format( result , "#.##" ) GoTo Finish End If 'If integer > 3 only If Len(CStr(result)) > 3 Then result = Format( result , "#,0" ) End If Finish:
SendKeys result
End Sub

Command.name: off app <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\utilities.bas" '#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\mouse.bas" '#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\apps.bas" '#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\autoIt.bas"
' Registered apps are pinned to the taskbar and are included in getAppNumber in apps.bas ' Registered apps sometimes have multiple windows open. If you configure the taskbar ' never to combine taskbar buttons, then you can use this macro to specify which window ' you want to select by count. For example, if there are 3 chrome windows open, ' you can select the 3rd one by saying "app chrome 3". If you say just "app chrome", ' it will select the first one.
' You can also use this macro with non-registered apps by simply saying "app" ' followed by any text you see in the window title bar or taskbar button. Sub Main ' is the last word in the dictation a number? dim words() as String dim windowNum as String dim appName as String words = Split(ListVar1) windowNum = words(UBound(words)) windowNum = numberNameToDigit(windowNum) if IsNumeric(windowNum) then for i = 0 to UBound(words) - 1 appName = appName & words(i) if i <> UBound(words) - 1 then appName = appName & " " end if next i else appName = ListVar1 windowNum = "" end if
' Is this a registered app? dim app as String app = getAppNumber(appName) if app = "" then ' Not a "registered" app. Search by title bar runAutoIt("ActivateWindow.au3", appName) else 'Registered app if windowNum <> "" then goToApp appName, windowNum else goToApp appName end if end if
Wait 0.1 CenterMouseOnActiveWindow
End Sub

Command.name: backup commands
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\paths.bas"
Sub Main dim fromFile as string, toFile as string dim theTime as Date theTime = Now() fromFile = getPath("KnowBrainer commands") & "\MyKBCommands.xml" toFile = getPath("KnowBrainer commands") & "\Mybackups\MyKBCommands_" & _ Year(theTime) & "-" & Month(theTime) & "-" & Day(theTime) & "_" & _ Hour(theTime) & Minute(theTime) & Second(theTime) & ".xml" FileCopy(fromFile, toFile) if MsgBox("Commands backed up to """ & toFile & """." & vbcrlf & vbcrlf & "Would you like to view its contents?", vbYesNo) = vbYes then ShellExecute(toFile) end if
End Sub

Command.name: line delete <dictation>
Command.description: Deletes any text in the current line.
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\utilities.bas"
Sub Main
' Get working text dim saveClipboard as String saveClipboard = Clipboard
SendKeys "{Home}+{End}^c"
ClipboardWait
dim fullText as String fulltext = Clipboard
' Get deletion point try for text with space first dim index as Integer dim findText as string index = InStr(LCase(fullText), Lcase(ListVar1) & " ") if index <> 0 then findText = ListVar1 & " " else ' Try leading space index = InStr(LCase(fullText), " " & LCase(ListVar1)) if index <> 0 then findText = " " & ListVar1 else ' Try plaintext index = InStr(LCase(fullText), LCase(ListVar1)) if index <> 0 then findText = ListVar1 else SendKeys "{Right}" exit sub end if end if end if
dim out as String out = Mid(fullText, 1, index - 1) & Mid(fullText, index + Len(findText))
Clipboard(out) Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 Clipboard(saveClipboard)
End Sub

Command.name: do math <calculator_memory_commands> memory
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\globals.bas"
Sub Main
select case ListVar1 Case "add" DoCalculateMemory(MemoryOperation.Add)
Case "subtract" DoCalculateMemory(MemoryOperation.Subtract) Case "multiply" DoCalculateMemory(MemoryOperation.Multiply)
case "divide" DoCalculateMemory(MemoryOperation.Divide)
Case "recall" DoCalculateMemory(MemoryOperation.Recall)
Case "clear" DoCalculateMemory(MemoryOperation.Clear)
Case "store" DoCalculateMemory(MemoryOperation.Store)
end select End Sub

Command.name: copy dictation box
Command.description: You can make the dictation box come up faster using this command.
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\settings.bas"
Sub Main ' The reason why the dictation box seems to come up so slowly most of the time ' is that the "copy" setting is set. Set "Copy" to "Do not copy" and use this command ' when you want to populate the dication box with the selected text. SendKeys("^c") Wait(0.1)
dim dictationBoxShortcut as String dictationBoxShortcut = GetSetting("dictation box shortcut") if Len(dictationBoxShortcut) = 0 then MsgBox("Dictation box shortcut is not set.") exit Sub End If
SendKeys(dictationBoxShortcut) Wait(1.0)
SendKeys("^v")
End Sub

Command.name: old get mouse position
Command.content:
Option Explicit
Type RECT Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type
Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type
' declare Win32 API functions
Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetCursorPos" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long
Declare Function GetWindowRect Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetWindowRect" (ByVal hwnd As Long, _ lpRect As RECT) As Long
Declare Function GetForegroundWindow& Lib "user32" ()
Function GetWinCurPos(hwnd As Long) As POINTAPI
Dim pt As POINTAPI Dim wRect As RECT Dim result As POINTAPI
GetCursorPos pt
GetWindowRect hwnd, wRect
result.x = pt.x - wRect.Left result.y = pt.y - wRect.Top
GetWinCurPos = result End Function Sub Main Dim hwnd As Long Dim result As POINTAPI Dim clip As String
hwnd = GetForegroundWindow result = GetWinCurPos(hwnd)
clip = "SetMousePosition 1," & result.x & _ "," & result.y clip = clip & Chr(13) & Chr(10) & _ "Wait .5" & Chr(13) & Chr(10) & _ "ButtonClick 1,1" & Chr(13) & Chr(10) ' Clipboard clip ' TTSPlayString "mouse position is ready to be pasted" End Sub

Command.content:
Sub Main value = CInt (ListVar2) If value > 99 Then For i = 1 To value/50 If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys"{Left 50}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys"{Right 50}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys"{Up 50}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys"{Down 50}" Next Else If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys "{Left "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys "{Right "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "{Up "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "{Down "+ListVar2+"}" end if
Wait 0.5
select case ListVar3 case "copy" SendKeys("^c") case "paste", "insert" SendKeys("^v") case "cut" SendKeys("^x") case "delete", "clear" SendKeys("{Delete}") end select
End Sub

Command.name: move window <Direction> <1to1000> <Direction> <1to1000>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\imports.bas" '#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\window.bas"
Sub Main dim windowRect as RECT GetActiveWindowRect(windowRect)
dim x, y, w, h as Integer x = windowRect.Left y = windowRect.Top w = windowRect.Right - windowRect.Left h = windowRect.Bottom - windowRect.Top
' Move 1 select case ListVar1 case "Left" x = x - CInt(ListVar2) case "Right" x = x + CInt(ListVar2) case "Up" y = y - CInt(ListVar2) case "Down" y = y + CInt(ListVar2) end select
' Move 2 select case ListVar3 case "Left" x = x - CInt(ListVar4) case "Right" x = x + CInt(ListVar4) case "Up" y = y - CInt(ListVar4) case "Down" y = y + CInt(ListVar4) end select
MoveActiveWindow(x, y, w, h) End Sub

Command.name: move window <Direction> <1to1000>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\imports.bas" '#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\window.bas"
Sub Main dim windowRect as RECT GetActiveWindowRect(windowRect)
dim x, y, w, h as Integer x = windowRect.Left y = windowRect.Top w = windowRect.Right - windowRect.Left h = windowRect.Bottom - windowRect.Top
select case ListVar1 case "Left" MoveActiveWindow(x - CInt(ListVar2), y, w, h) case "Right" MoveActiveWindow(x + CInt(ListVar2), y, w, h) case "Up" MoveActiveWindow(x, y - CInt(ListVar2), w, h) case "Down" MoveActiveWindow(x, y + CInt(ListVar2), w, h) end select End Sub

exit Sub

Command.name: app <taskbar_apps> <1to10>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\utilities.bas" '#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\mouse.bas" '#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\apps.bas" '#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\autoIt.bas"
Sub Main
' In order for this macro to work, you must define entries in a file called "apps-<machine name>.txt" ' Replace <machine name> in the filename with the actual machinine name. ' You can obtain the machinine name by saying "machine name".
' In apps-<machine name>.txt, provide entries for each of the items in <taskbar_apps> ' that apply to the icons on your taskbar. You must provide the position of each icon.
' I did it this way so that you could modify the positioning of the icons on your taskbar to suit your needs ' without having to change the macro list.
' You can also have separate taskbar arrangments for different machines – one for your work machine and one for your home machine
CenterMouseOnActiveWindow if not goToApp(ListVar1, numberNameToDigit(ListVar2)) then runAutoIt("ActivateWindow.au3", ListVar1) end if WAit 0.1 CenterMouseOnActiveWindow
End Sub

' I did it this way so that you could modify the positioning of the icons on your taskbar to suit your needs ' without having to change the macro list.

End Sub

Command.name: swap back <myalphabet>
Command.content: Sub Main dim text as String text = Split(ListVar1, "\")(0) if text = "space" then text = " " ElseIf text = "backslash" then text = "\" End If SendKeys("{Del}" & text) SendKeys "{Backspace}" & text End Sub

Command.name: extend <Direction> <1to100> <Direction> <1to100>
Command.content:
Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Up" then SendKeys "+{Up " & ListVar2 & "}" elseif ListVar1 = "Down" then SendKeys "+{Down " & ListVar2 & "}" elseif ListVar1 = "Left" then SendKeys "+{Left " & ListVar2 & "}" elseif ListVar1 = "Right" then SendKeys "+{Right " & ListVar2 & "}" end if
if ListVar3 = "Up" then SendKeys "+{Up " & ListVar4 & "}" elseif ListVar3 = "Down" then SendKeys "+{Down " & ListVar4 & "}" elseif ListVar3 = "Left" then SendKeys "+{Left " & ListVar4 & "}" elseif ListVar3 = "Right" then SendKeys "+{Right " & ListVar4 & "}" end if End Sub

Command.name: app <taskbar_apps>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\mouse.bas" '#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\apps.bas" '#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\autoIt.bas"
Sub Main
' In order for this macro to work, you must define entries in a file called "apps-<machine name>.txt" ' Replace <machine name> in the filename with the actual machinine name. ' You can obtain the machinine name by saying "machine name".
' In apps-<machine name>.txt, provide entries for each of the items in <taskbar_apps> ' that apply to the icons on your taskbar. You must provide the position of each icon.
' I did it this way so that you could modify the positioning of the icons on your taskbar to suit your needs ' without having to change the macro list.
' You can also have separate taskbar arrangments for different machines – one for your work machine and one for your home machine
CenterMouseOnActiveWindow if not goToApp(ListVar1) then runAutoIt("ActivateWindow.au3", ListVar1) end if WAit 0.1 CenterMouseOnActiveWindow
End Sub

Command.content:
Sub Main

End Sub

Command.name: old start scrolling <Direction> <1to300>
Command.description: Mouse Up, Down, Left or Right 13 to 300
Command.content: Sub Main ButtonClick 4,1 Wait 0.5 offset = Val( ListVar2) if ListVar1 = "Up" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, -offset if ListVar1 = "Down" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, offset if ListVar1 = "Left" then SetMousePosition 2, -offset, 0 if ListVar1 = "Right" then SetMousePosition 2, offset, 0 End Sub

Command.name: old start Scrolling <DirectionSpeed>
Command.description: Scroll Up, Down, Left or Right
Command.content: Sub Main ButtonClick 4,1 Wait 0.5 if ListVar1 = "Up Very Fast" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, -110 if ListVar1 = "Up Fast" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, -80 if ListVar1 = "Up Medium" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, -50 if ListVar1 = "Up" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, -50 if ListVar1 = "Up Slow" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, -35 if ListVar1 = "Up Very Slow" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, -15 if ListVar1 = "Down Very Fast" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, 110 if ListVar1 = "Down Fast" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, 80 if ListVar1 = "Down Medium" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, 50 if ListVar1 = "Down" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, 50 if ListVar1 = "Down Slow" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, 35 if ListVar1 = "Down Very Slow" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, 15 if ListVar1 = "Left Very Fast" then SetMousePosition 2, -110, 0 if ListVar1 = "Left Fast" then SetMousePosition 2, -80, 0 if ListVar1 = "Left Medium" then SetMousePosition 2, -50, 0 if ListVar1 = "Left" then SetMousePosition 2, -50, 0 if ListVar1 = "Left Slow" then SetMousePosition 2, -35, 0 if ListVar1 = "Left Very Slow" then SetMousePosition 2, -14, 0 if ListVar1 = "Right Very Fast" then SetMousePosition 2, 100, 0 if ListVar1 = "Right Fast" then SetMousePosition 2, 80, 0 if ListVar1 = "Right Medium" then SetMousePosition 2, 50, 50 if ListVar1 = "Right" then SetMousePosition 2, 50, 50 if ListVar1 = "Right Slow" then SetMousePosition 2, 35, 0 if ListVar1 = "Right Very Slow" then SetMousePosition 2, 14, 0 End Sub

Command.name: start scrolling <Direction>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\mouse.bas"
Sub Main select case ListVar1 Case "Left" WheelClickToScroll(ScrollMode.Enable, WheelScrollDirection.W) Case "Right" WheelClickToScroll(ScrollMode.Enable, WheelScrollDirection.E)
Case "Up" WheelClickToScroll(ScrollMode.Enable, WheelScrollDirection.N)
Case "Down" WheelClickToScroll(ScrollMode.Enable, WheelScrollDirection.S)
end select End Sub

Command.name: scroll <speed>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\mouse.bas"
Sub Main select case ListVar1 Case "faster" WheelClickToScroll(ScrollMode.ChangeSpeed, 0, 10) Case "much faster WheelClickToScroll(ScrollMode.ChangeSpeed, 0, 40)
Case "slower" WheelClickToScroll(ScrollMode.ChangeSpeed, 0, -10)
Case "much slower" WheelClickToScroll(ScrollMode.ChangeSpeed, 0, -40)
end select End Sub

Command.name: <mouse_command>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\imports.bas" '#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\mouse.bas"
Sub Main select case ListVar1 case "click", "left click" ClickMouse() case "shift click" ClickMouse(KeyModifier.shift) case "control click" ClickMouse(KeyModifier.control) case "double-click" ButtonClick(1,2) case "right-click" ButtonClick(2,1) case "pick up", "drag", "mouse down" PressMouse(MouseButtonPosition.Down) case "put down", "drop", "mouse up" PressMouse(MouseButtonPosition.Up) case "middle mouse down" DoMouseEvent(MouseButton.Middle, MouseButtonPosition.Down) case "middle mouse up" DoMouseEvent(MouseButton.Middle, MouseButtonPosition.Up) end select End Sub

Command.name: <key_modifier> key <DirUpDown>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\imports.bas" '#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\keyboard.bas"
Sub Main dim key as KeyModifier dim keyNum as Integer keyNum = Split(ListVar1, "\")(0) select case keyNum case 1 key = KeyModifier.control Case 2 key = KeyModifier.shift Case 4 key = KeyModifier.alt Case 8 key = KeyModifier.win end select
if ListVar2 = "Down" then PressModifierKey(key) elseif Listvar2 = "Up" then ReleaseModifierKey(key) end if End Sub

Command.name: go to <1to12> <AmPm>
Command.content:
Sub Main dim startOfDay as integer startOfDay = 8 dim slotsPerHour as integer slotsPerHour = 2
SendKeys "{Home}" ' You are now at 8 AM
dim theHour as integer theHour = CInt(ListVar1) if ListVar2 = "PM" and theHour <> 12 then theHour = theHour + 12 end if
if theHour < startOfDay then SendKeys "{up " & CStr((startOfDay - theHour) & slotsPerHour) & "}" else SendKeys "{down " & CStr((theHour - startOfDay) * slotsPerHour) & "}" end if
End Sub

Command.name: go to <1to12> 30 <AmPm>
Command.content:
Sub Main dim startOfDay as integer startOfDay = 8 dim slotsPerHour as integer slotsPerHour = 2
SendKeys "{Home}" ' You are now at 8 AM
dim theHour as integer theHour = CInt(ListVar1) if ListVar2 = "PM" and theHour <> 12 then theHour = theHour + 12 end if
if theHour < startOfDay then SendKeys "{up " & CStr((startOfDay - theHour) & slotsPerHour) & "}" else SendKeys "{down " & CStr((theHour - startOfDay) * slotsPerHour) & "}" end if
SendKeys "{down}" End Sub

Command.name: change view <dictation>
Command.content:
Sub Main SendKeys("%vcv{home}")
dim viewName as String viewName = LCase(ListVar1)
Dim count as Integer
select case viewName Case "doug" count = 0 Case "doug-hidden" count = 1 Case "detailed" count = 2 Case "simple list" count = 3 Case "to do list" count = 4 Case "prioritized" count = 5 Case "active" count = 6 Case "completed" count = 7 Case "today" count = 8 Case "next 7 days" count = 9 Case "overdue" count = 10 Case "assigned" count = 11 Case "server tasks" count = 12 end select
SendKeys("{right " & CStr(count) & "}") SendKeys("~") End Sub

Command.name: font color <Color>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\office.bas"
Sub Main SendKeys "%ofc" PickColor(ListVar1, true)
exit Sub
SendKeys "%ofc" SendKeys "{Up 2}{Right}"
select case ListVar1 case "Maroon" ' Already there Case "Red" SendKeys "{Right}" Case "Orange" SendKeys "{Right 2}" Case "Yellow" SendKeys "{Right 3}" Case "Light Green" SendKeys "{Right 4}" Case "Green" SendKeys "{Right 5}" Case "Light Blue" SendKeys "{Right 6}" Case "Blue" SendKeys "{Right 7}" Case "Dark Blue" SendKeys "{Right 8}" Case "Navy Blue" SendKeys "{Right 8}" Case "Purple" SendKeys "{Right 9}" case else ' Black SendKeys("{Home}") end select
SendKeys "{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: Highlight <Color>
Command.content:
Sub Main SendKeys("%oi") SendKeys("{Home}")
select case ListVar1 case "Maroon" SendKeys("{Down 2}") Case "Red" SendKeys "{Down}" Case "Orange" SendKeys "{Down}" Case "Yellow" ' Already there Case "Light Green" SendKeys "{Right}" Case "Green" SendKeys "{Right 3}{Down}" Case "Light Blue" SendKeys "{Right 2}" Case "Blue" SendKeys "{Right 4}" Case "Dark Blue" SendKeys "{Down}{Right}" Case "Navy Blue" SendKeys "{Down}{Right}" Case "Purple" SendKeys "{Right 4}{Down}" case "Magenta" SendKeys("{Right 3}") case "Teal" SendKeys("{Down}{Right 2}") case "Olive" SendKeys("{Down 2}{Right}") case "Dark Grey", "Grey" SendKeys("{Down 2}{Right 2}") case "Light Grey" SendKeys("{Down 2}{Right 3}") case "Black" SendKeys("{Down 2}{Right 4}") case else ' Clear SendKeys("n") exit Sub end select
SendKeys("{Enter}")
'HeardWord "select", ListVar1 'Wait 1 'SendKeys "^c" 'Wait 0.2 'SendKeys "^%h" 'Wait 1 'EmulateRecognition "go back" End Sub

Command.name: mail folder <dictation>
Command.description: Say the folder name to select it. If a folder is a sub folder, say the first word of the parent folder followed by "sub" then the desired folder, i.e. "mail folder inbox sub help".
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\outlook.bas"
' Say the folder name to select it. ' If a folder is a sub folder, say the first word of the parent folder followed by "sub" ' then the desired folder, i.e. "mail folder my inbox sub encrypted". Sub Main dim text as string text = Replace(ListVar1, " sub ", ",") SelectFolder text End Sub

Command.name: <folders>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\outlook.bas"
Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Calendar" then SendKeys "^2" if ListVar1 = "Notes" then SendKeys "^5" 'if ListVar1 = "Tasks" then SendKeys("^4") if ListVar1 = "Tasks" then SelectFolder("tasks") if ListVar1 = "Journal" then SendKeys "^8" if ListVar1 = "Contacts" then SendKeys "^3" if ListVar1 = "Folder List" then SendKeys "^6" if ListVar1 = "Shortcuts" then SendKeys "^7" if ListVar1 = "Mail" then SendKeys "^1" End Sub

Command.name: select <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\window.bas"
Sub Main dim windowText(3) as String windowText(0) = "Message" windowText(1) = "Meeting Response" windowText(2) = "Task" if CheckWindowText(windowText) then SendKeys("^f") SendKeys(ListVar1) SendKeys("{Enter}{Escape}") end if End Sub

Command.name: <NextOrPrevious> week
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\window.bas"
Sub Main if CheckWindowText("Calendar") then if ListVar1 = "Back" or ListVar1 = "Last" or ListVar1 = "Left" or _ ListVar1 = "Previous" or ListVar1 = "Up" then SendKeys "%{Up}" elseif ListVar1 = "Down" or ListVar1 = "Forward" or ListVar1 = "Next" or ListVar1 = "next" or _ ListVar1 = "Right" then SendKeys "%{Down}" end if End If End Sub

Command.name: move to folder <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\outlook.bas"
Sub Main
' Say the folder name to move to it. ' If a folder is a sub folder, say the first word of the parent folder followed by "sub" ' then the desired folder, i.e. "mail folder my inbox sub encrypted".
dim folders as String folders = Replace(ListVar1, " sub ", ",")
MoveToFolder(folders, ",") End Sub

Command.name: <row_column> <code_math_operator> <1to100>
Command.description: Example: column width plus 5
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\window.bas" '#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\utilities.bas"
Sub Main dim plus as Boolean
if ListVar1 = "row" Or ListVar1 = "rows" then SendKeys("%hoh") WaitForWindow("Row Height") Else ' Column width SendKeys("%how") WaitForWindow("Column Width") End If
dim valueStr as String dim value as Double
SendKeys("^c") valueStr = GetClipboard() value = CDbl(valueStr)
if Split(ListVar2, "\")(0) = "+" then value = value + ListVar3 Else value = value - ListVar3 End If
PutClipboard(CStr(value)) SendKeys("^a^v~")
End Sub

case "column" SendKeys("^{space}") for i = 1 to ListVar2 SendKeys "+{F10}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "i" next i end select End Sub

' Declare keyboard events Windows API function Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long ' declare virtual key constant for the control key Const VK_CTRL = &h11
Sub Main keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) Wait 0.1 SendKeys"f" Wait 0.1 keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,2,0) Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar1 End Sub

Command.name: Play <dictation>
Command.description: Used to force dictation into any field you can type in and adds a extra space after your dication
Command.content:
' Declare keyboard events Windows API function Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long ' declare virtual key constant for the control key Const VK_CTRL = &h11
Sub Main keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) Wait 0.1 SendKeys"f" Wait 0.1 keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,2,0) Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 1 SendKeys "{Down}" Wait 0.4 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.4 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "first" then SendKeys "^1" if ListVar1 = "second" then SendKeys "^2" if ListVar1 = "third" then SendKeys "^3" if ListVar1 = "fouth" then SendKeys "^4" if ListVar1 = "fifth" then SendKeys "^5" if ListVar1 = "sixth" then SendKeys "^6" if ListVar1 = "seventh" then SendKeys "^7" if ListVar1 = "eighth" then SendKeys "^8" if ListVar1 = "ninth" then SendKeys "^9" Wait .5 SendKeys "^w" End Sub

Command.name: Copy To <AppList>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.1 If ListVar1 = "Access" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Access" If ListVar1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Excel" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Excel" If ListVar1 = "Google Chrome" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Google Chrome" If ListVar1 = "Front Page" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Front Page" If ListVar1 = "Firefox" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Firfox" If ListVar1 = "Internet Explorer" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Internet Explorer" If ListVar1 = "IE 7" Then AppSwapWith "IEXPLORE" If ListVar1 = "NaturallySpeaking" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Next Window" Then SendKeys "%{Esc}" If ListVar1 = "Notepad" Then HeardWord "Start","Notepad" If ListVar1 = "One Note" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Onenote" If ListVar1 = "Other Window" Then SendKeys "%{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Outlook" If ListVar1 = "Paint" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Paint" If ListVar1 = "Power Point" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft PowerPoint" If ListVar1 = "Previous Window" Then SendKeys "+{Alt+Esc}" If ListVar1 = "Publisher" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Publisher" If ListVar1 = "QuickBooks" Then HeardWord "switch","to","QuickBooks" If ListVar1 = "Word" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Word" If ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Wordpad" If ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch","to","WordPerfect" Wait 2 SendKeys "^v Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: Add <Punctuation> After <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%e" Wait .2 SendKeys "f" Wait .5 SendKeys ListVar2 Wait .2 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait .3 SendKeys "{Right}" Wait .1 SendKeys ""+ListVar1+"" Wait .3 SendKeys "^{End}" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%e" Wait .2 SendKeys "f" Wait .5 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .2 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait .5 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{'}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{'}" Wait .3 SendKeys "^{End}" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%e" Wait .2 SendKeys "f" Wait .5 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .2 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait .5 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{""}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{""}" Wait .3 SendKeys "^{End}" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%e" Wait .2 SendKeys "f" Wait .5 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .2 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait .5 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{(}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{)}" Wait .3 SendKeys "^{End}" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%d" Wait 0.2 If ListVar1 = "Ask" Then SendKeys "http://www.ask.com/?o=0&l=dir" If ListVar1 = "Bing" Then SendKeys "http://www.bing.com/" If ListVar1 = "Duck Duck" Then SendKeys "https://duckduckgo.com/" If ListVar1 = "Duck Duck Go" Then SendKeys "https://duckduckgo.com/" If ListVar1 = "eBay" Then SendKeys "http://www.ebay.com/" If ListVar1 = "Google" Then SendKeys "http://www.google.com/" If ListVar1 = "KnowBrainer" Then SendKeys "http://www.knowbrainer.com/" If ListVar1 = "no-brainer" Then SendKeys "http://www.knowbrainer.com/" If ListVar1 = "KnowBrainer Forum" Then SendKeys "http://www.knowbrainer.com/forums/forum/search.cfm" If ListVar1 = "no-brainer Forum" Then SendKeys "http://www.knowbrainer.com/forums/forum/search.cfm" Wait 1 SendKeys "~" Wait 3 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.name: jira confluence table <1to9> columns <1to9> rows
Command.content:
Sub Main for col = 1 to ListVar1 SendKeys "|| " next col SendKeys "||{Enter}{Del}{Down}" SendKeys "{tab " & str(int(ListVar1) * int(ListVar2) - 1) & "}"
SendKeys "{up " & ListVar2 & "}"
SendKeys "{left " & ListVar1 & "}" End Sub

Command.name: JIRA insert table <1to10> columns <1to10> rows
Command.content:
Sub Main for i = 1 to ListVar1 SendKeys "|| " next i SendKeys "||{Enter}"
for row = 1 to ListVar2 for col = 1 to ListVar1 SendKeys "| " next col SendKeys "|{Enter}" next row
SendKeys "{Up " & str(Int(ListVar2) + 1) & "}{Home}{Right 2}" End Sub

Command.name: JIRA heading <jira_heading>
Command.content:
Sub Main SendKeys "h2. " & ListVar1 & "{Enter}" if StrComp(ListVar1, "Acceptance Criteria", vbTextCompare) = 0 then SendKeys "* " elseif StrComp(ListVar1, "To Do", vbTextCompare) = 0 or StrComp(ListVar1, "Steps to Reproduce", vbTextCompare) = 0 then SendKeys "# " end if
End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%d" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^c{Tab}" TTSPlayString("copied") End Sub

Command.name: Forward List
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\mouse.bas"
Sub Main dim screenX as Long dim screenY as Long ConvertMousePositionToScreenCoordinates(58,59, screenX, screenY) SendKeys "{Move " & screenX & ", " & screenY & "}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{DownLeft}", True Wait(1) SendKeys "{upleft}" End Sub

Command.name: move tab to <chrome_move_tab>
Command.content: ' This command depends on the Tab to Window extension Sub Main select case ListVar1 case "window" SendKeys "%x" case "next window" SendKeys "%z" case "next display" SendKeys "+%d" end select End Sub

SendKeys "^+x"

Command.name: jira <jira_command>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\paths.bas" '#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\utilities.bas"
Sub Main if ListVar1 = "starred" then SendKeys "\" elseif ListVar1 = "create" then SendKeys "c" elseif ListVar1 = "search issues" then ShellExecute(getUrl("jira search issues")) elseif ListVar1 = "search" then SendKeys "/" else SendKeys "," Wait 0.3 SendKeys ListVar1 SendKeys "{Enter}" end if End Sub

Command.name: go tab <Direction_3> <1to8>
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Next" or ListVar1 = "Right" then SendKeys "^{Tab " & ListVar2 & "}" if ListVar1 = "Previous" or ListVar1 = "Left" then SendKeys "^+{Tab " & ListVar2 & "}" End Sub

Command.name: go to site <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\utilities.bas" '#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\paths.bas"
Sub Main SendKeys "%d" Wait 0.1 dim theUrl as String theUrl = getUrl(ListVar1) if theUrl = "" then Beep exit Sub end if 'SendKeys theUrl ' The URL can be too long for SendKeys (really...???) TypeString(theUrl) SendKeys "{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: <Direction> <1to1000>
Command.content: Sub Main value = CInt (ListVar2) If value > 99 Then For i = 1 To value/50 If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys"{Left 50}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys"{Right 50}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys"{Up 50}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys"{Down 50}" Next Else If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys "{Left "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys "{Right "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "{Up "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "{Down "+ListVar2+"}" End If End Sub

Command.name: edit comment <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\explorer.bas" '#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\utilities.bas"
Sub Main dim path as String CopyFilePath path = GetClipboard() dim comment as string comment = InputBox("Enter the comment:", "Edit File Comment", ListVar1) dim theCommand as String theCommand = "Set-ItemProperty -Path """ & path & """ -Name Comments -Value """ & comment & """" MsgBox(theCommand) PutClipboard(theCommand) RunPowerShellCommand(theCommand) End Sub

Command.name: Change <dictation>
Command.description: Example: Say "Replace <dog> With <cat> to replace the last occurrence of the word "dog" with "cat"
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim newPhrase As String Dim phraseToReplace As String
On Error Resume Next 'Finds the location of the magic trigger word "with" which separates the phrase that needs to be replaced with the phrase that replaces it index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "to") 'This is the variable into which the phrase to be replaced goes phraseToReplace = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), 1, index - 2) 'This is the variable into which the new phrase goes newPhrase = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), index + 3, Len(CStr(ListVar1)) - index + 5) SendKeys "^a" 'Selects everything Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^c" 'Copies everything to the clipboard for processing Wait 1.5 testPhrase = Clipboard$() 'Dumps the clipboard into this variable newString = Replace$(testPhrase, phraseToReplace, newPhrase) 'Makes the replacement and places the corrected phrase in this variable Clipboard newString 'Places the corrected phrase in the clipboard for pasting in the next command below SendKeys "^v" Wait 1 SendKeys "{End}" 'Go back to the end of the document End End Sub

Command.name: Replace <dictation>
Command.description: Example: Say "Replace All <dog> With <cat> to replace all occurrences of the word "dog" with "cat"
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim newPhrase As String Dim phraseToReplace As String
On Error Resume Next 'Finds the location of the magic trigger word "with" which separates the phrase that needs to be replaced with the phrase that replaces it index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "with") 'This is the variable into which the phrase to be replaced goes phraseToReplace = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), 1, index - 2) 'This is the variable into which the new phrase goes newPhrase = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), index + 5, Len(CStr(ListVar1)) - index + 5) SendKeys "^a" 'Selects everything Wait 1.5 SendKeys "^c" 'Copies the selection to the clipboard for processing Wait 2.5 testPhrase = Clipboard$() 'Dumps the clipboard into this variable newString = Replace$(testPhrase, phraseToReplace, newPhrase) 'Makes the replacement and places the corrected phrase in this variable Clipboard newString 'Places the corrected phrase in the clipboard for pasting in the next command below SendKeys "^v" Wait 1 SendKeys "{End}" 'Go back to the bottom of the document to continue dictating End End Sub

dim text as string text = GetClipboard() TypeString(text) SendKeys "{Right}" End Sub

Command.name: <FontColor> Back
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Red" then HeardWord "color","it","red" if ListVar1 = "Yellow" then HeardWord "color","it","yellow" if ListVar1 = "Green" then HeardWord "color","it","green" if ListVar1 = "Black" then HeardWord "color","it","black" if ListVar1 = "Blue" then HeardWord "color","it","blue" if ListVar1 = "Purple" then HeardWord "color","it","purple" Wait 1 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Search <web> for <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%d" Wait 0.2 If ListVar1 = "Ask" Then SendKeys "http://www.ask.com/?o=0&l=dir" If ListVar1 = "Bing" Then SendKeys "http://www.bing.com/" If ListVar1 = "Duck Duck" Then SendKeys "https://duckduckgo.com/" If ListVar1 = "Duck Duck Go" Then SendKeys "https://duckduckgo.com/" If ListVar1 = "eBay" Then SendKeys "http://www.ebay.com/" If ListVar1 = "Google" Then SendKeys "http://www.google.com/" If ListVar1 = "KnowBrainer" Then SendKeys "http://www.knowbrainer.com/" If ListVar1 = "no-brainer" Then SendKeys "http://www.knowbrainer.com/" If ListVar1 = "KnowBrainer Forum" Then SendKeys "http://www.knowbrainer.com/forums/forum/search.cfm" If ListVar1 = "no-brainer Forum" Then SendKeys "http://www.knowbrainer.com/forums/forum/search.cfm" If ListVar1 = "Nuance Knowledgebase" Then SendKeys "http://nuance.custhelp.com/" If ListVar1 = "Wikipedia" Then SendKeys "http://wikipedia.org/" If ListVar1 = "Yahoo" Then SendKeys "http://www.yahoo.com/" If ListVar1 = "You Tube" Then SendKeys "https://www.youtube.com/" If ListVar1 = "Dictionary" Then SendKeys "http://dictionary.reference.com/" If ListVar1 = "Thesaurus" Then SendKeys "http://www.thesaurus.com/" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "~" Wait 3 SendKeys ListVar2 Wait 1 SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.name: <edit_commands> table <row_column>
Command.content:
Sub Main dim param2 as String param2 = Split(ListVar2, "\")(1) dim rowCol as String
if param2 = "row" then rowCol = "r" else rowCol = "c" end if
SendKeys "%jl" Wait 0.1
select case ListVar1 case "select" SendKeys "q" Wait 0.1 SendKeys rowCol case "delete" SendKeys "d" SendKeys rowCol case "clear" SendKeys "q" Wait 0.1 SendKeys rowCol SendKeys "{Del}" case "copy" case "cut" case "paste" case "insert" end select
End Sub

Command.name: <height_width> <grow_shrink> <1to100>
Command.content:
Sub Main select case ListVar2 case "grow", "expand", "plus" if ListVar1 = "height" then SendKeys "%xrh" else SendKeys "%xrw" end if case "shrink", "minus" if ListVar1 = "height" then SendKeys "%xrr" else SendKeys "%xre" end if end select
Wait 0.1
SendKeys ListVar3 & "~" end sub

Command.name: set arrow <Location>
Command.content:
Sub Main SendKeys("%jd") Wait(0.1) SendKeys("so") Wait(0.1) SendKeys("r")
'SendKeys("{F6}")
dim location as String location = Split(ListVar1, "|")(0) if location = "Left" or location = "Start" then ' Start of arrow SendKeys("{down 5}") 'StartArrow elseif location = "Right" or location = "End" then ' End of arrow SendKeys("{down 4}") 'EndArrow elseif location = "Both" then SendKeys("{down 6}") 'StartArrow 'EndArrow elseif location = "None" then 'SendKeys("b") 'SendKeys("{Home}{Enter}") 'SendKeys("e") 'SendKeys("{Home}{Enter}")
End If
'SendKeys("{Escape}") 'SendKeys("+{F6}") SendKeys("~") End Sub
private sub StartArrow() SendKeys("b") SendKeys("{Home}{Right}{Enter}") SendKeys("ss%{Down}{Home}{Right}{down 2}{Enter}") end sub
private sub EndArrow() SendKeys("e") SendKeys("{Home}{Right}{Enter}") SendKeys("nn%{Down}{Home}{Right}{down 2}{Enter}") end sub

Command.name: <before_after> <dictation>
Command.content:
Sub Main SendKeys("^f") Wait(0.1)
' Surround the text with quotes so that it searches the whole string and not individual words SendKeys("{""}") SendKeys(ListVar2) SendKeys("{""}") Wait(0.1) SendKeys("{Esc}")
if ListVar1 = "before" then SendKeys("{Left}") ElseIf ListVar1 = "after" then SendKeys("{Right}") End If End Sub

Command.name: Search <web> for <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%d" Wait 0.2 If ListVar1 = "Ask" Then SendKeys "http://www.ask.com/?o=0&l=dir" If ListVar1 = "Bing" Then SendKeys "http://www.bing.com/" If ListVar1 = "Duck Duck" Then SendKeys "https://duckduckgo.com/" If ListVar1 = "Duck Duck Go" Then SendKeys "https://duckduckgo.com/" If ListVar1 = "eBay" Then SendKeys "http://www.ebay.com/" If ListVar1 = "Google" Then SendKeys "http://www.google.com/" If ListVar1 = "KnowBrainer" Then SendKeys "http://www.knowbrainer.com/" If ListVar1 = "no-brainer" Then SendKeys "http://www.knowbrainer.com/" If ListVar1 = "KnowBrainer Forum" Then SendKeys "http://www.knowbrainer.com/forums/forum/search.cfm" If ListVar1 = "no-brainer Forum" Then SendKeys "http://www.knowbrainer.com/forums/forum/search.cfm" If ListVar1 = "Nuance Knowledgebase" Then SendKeys "http://nuance.custhelp.com/" If ListVar1 = "Wikipedia" Then SendKeys "http://wikipedia.org/" If ListVar1 = "Yahoo" Then SendKeys "http://www.yahoo.com/" If ListVar1 = "You Tube" Then SendKeys "https://www.youtube.com/" If ListVar1 = "Dictionary" Then SendKeys "http://dictionary.reference.com/" If ListVar1 = "Thesaurus" Then SendKeys "http://www.thesaurus.com/" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "~" Wait 3 SendKeys ListVar2 Wait 1 SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.name: Search For <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%d" Wait 0.2 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 1 SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.name: Transfer
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^x" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "n" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Tab}" Wait 0.2 AppBringUp "WordPad" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^x" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "n" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Tab}" End Sub

Command.name: Choose <1to10>
Command.description: Selects the first through the 10th contact in the recent list, starting at the top
Command.content:
Sub Main ' Click on the entry dim mouseRelevantTo, mousex, mousey, mouseDelta as Integer mouseRelevantTo = 1 mousex = 150 mousey = 250 mouseDelta = 60
dim count as Integer count = int(ListVar1) - 1 mousey = mousey + (mouseDelta * count)
SetMousePosition mouseRelevantTo, mousex, mousey Wait .1 ButtonClick 1,1
End Sub

Command.name: <NextOrPrevious> diff
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\remote.bas"
Sub Main dim activeApp as String activeApp = LCase(GetActiveApplication())
select case ListVar1 case "Back", "Last", "Previous", "Up", "Left" if activeApp = "beyond compare" then SendKeys("^p") ElseIf activeApp = "merge manager" then SendKeys("%{Left}") End If
case "Down", "Forward", "Next", "next", "Right" if activeApp = "beyond compare" then SendKeys("^n") ElseIf activeApp = "merge manager" then SendKeys("%{Right}") End If
end select
End Sub

Command.name: color <1to4> <Color>
Command.content:
Sub Main
SendKeys("%h" & ListVar1) SendKeys("%hec") Wait(0.1) SendKeys("%b{Home}")
select case ListVar2 case "Black" SendKeys("{Down 5}") case "Blue" SendKeys("{Down 3}{Right 4}") case "Green" SendKeys("{Down 3}{Right 2}") case "Grey" SendKeys("{Down 5}{Right 3}") case "Purple" SendKeys("{Down 3}{Right 7}") case "Red" SendKeys("{Down}") case "Orange" SendKeys("{Down 3}{Right}") case "Teal" SendKeys("{Down 2}{Right 3}") case "Yellow" SendKeys("{Down}{Right}") case "White" SendKeys("{End}") case "Maroon" SendKeys("{Down 3}") case "Light Green" SendKeys("{Down 2}{Right 2}") case "Light Blue" SendKeys("{Down}{Right 5}") case "Dark Blue" SendKeys("{Down 2}{Right 4}") case "Navy Blue" SendKeys("{Down 4}{Right 4}") case else MsgBox("Unsupported color: " & ListVar2) exit sub end select
SendKeys("{Space}{Enter}") End Sub

select case ListVar1 Case "square", "rectangle" SendKeys("{Right 3}~") Case "circle", "oval", "ellipse" SendKeys("{Right 2}~")
Case "line" SendKeys("~")
end select End Sub

Command.name: <mouse_command> <1to100> by <1to100>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\grid.bas"
Sub Main
select case ListVar1 case "move to", "move" ClickGrid(GridAction.Move, ListVar2, ListVar3)
Case "click", "left click" ClickGrid(GridAction.Click, ListVar2, ListVar3)
Case "shift click" ClickGrid(GridAction.Click, ListVar2, ListVar3, true)
Case "control click" ClickGrid(GridAction.Click, ListVar2, ListVar3, false, true)
Case "double-click" ClickGrid(GridAction.DoubleClick, ListVar2, ListVar3)
Case "right-click" ClickGrid(GridAction.RightClick, ListVar2, ListVar3)
Case "pick up", "drag", "mouse down" ClickGrid(GridAction.DragFrom, ListVar2, ListVar3)
Case "put down", "drop", "mouse up" ClickGrid(GridAction.DropTo, ListVar2, ListVar3)
end select
End Sub

Command.name: bitsim <bitsim_commands>
Command.content:
Sub Main dim paramCount as String dim theCommand as String dim parts() as string parts = Split(ListVar1, "\") paramCount = parts(0) theCommand = parts(1)
select case paramCount case "0" SendKeys("{(}" & theCommand & "{)}")
Case "1" SendKeys("{(}" & theCommand & " {)}") SendKeys("{Left}") end select
End Sub

SendKeys(":") SendKeys(theCommand) SendKeys("~") End Sub

Command.name: git <git_command>
Command.content:
Sub Main dim theToken as String dim theCommand as string dim numParams as Integer dim tokens() as String
' ListVar1 as the format: <numparams>/<command>\<spoken word>
theToken = Split(ListVar1, "\")(0) tokens = Split(theToken, "/") numParams = CInt(tokens(0)) theCommand = tokens(1)
SendKeys("git ") SendKeys(theCommand)
if numParams = 0 then SendKeys("~") else SendKeys(" ") End If
End Sub

Sub Main
End Sub

Command.name: go to <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\keyboard.bas"
Sub Main dim pane as String pane = LCase(ListVar1)
if pane = "code" or pane = "code window" then ShowKeyTips SendKeys("c~") Wait(0.1) SendKeys("~") exit Sub End If
SendKeys("%vt{Left}t")
dim count as Integer
select case pane case "backup history" count = 1 case "base classes" count = 2 case "bookmarks" count = 3 case "breakpoints" count = 4 case "build" count = 5 case "class" count = 6 case "clipboards" count = 7 case "code annotations" count = 8 case "deaths", "death", "defs", "deaf", "def" count = 9 case "derived classes" count = 10 case "exceptions" count = 11 case "file tabs" count = 12 case "files" count = 13 case "find and replace" count = 14 case "find symbol" count = 15 case "ftp" count = 16 case "ftp client" count = 17 case "message list" count = 18 case "notifications" count = 19 case "open" count = 20 case "output" count = 21 case "preview" count = 22 case "project", "projects" count = 23 case "references" count = 24 case "regex evaluator" count = 25 case "search results" count = 26 case "slick see stack" count = 27 case "symbol arguments" count = 28 case "symbol properties" count = 29 case "symbol uses", "symbol uses calling tree" count = 30 case "symbols" count = 31 case "unit testing" count = 32 end select
SendKeys("{down " & CStr(count) & "}~") End Sub

Command.name: test window <Direction> <1to1000>
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\imports.bas" '#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\window.bas"
Sub Main dim windowRect as RECT GetActiveWindowRect(windowRect)
dim x, y, w, h as Integer x = windowRect.Left y = windowRect.Top w = windowRect.Right - windowRect.Left h = windowRect.Bottom - windowRect.Top
select case ListVar1 case "Left" MoveActiveWindow(x - CInt(ListVar2), y, w, h) case "Right" MoveActiveWindow(x + CInt(ListVar2), y, w, h) case "Up" MoveActiveWindow(x, y - CInt(ListVar2), w, h) case "Down" MoveActiveWindow(x, y + CInt(ListVar2), w, h) end select End Sub

Command.name: Paste URL
Command.content:
'#Uses "C:\Users\KnowBrainer\CommonModules\cache.bas"
Sub Main ClearDelayedCommands() AddDelayedCommand("{alt+d}", DelayedCommandType.UseSendSystemKeys, 100) AddDelayedCommand("{ctrl+v}", DelayedCommandType.UseSendSystemKeys, 100) AddDelayedCommand("{enter}", DelayedCommandType.UseSendSystemKeys, 100) RunDelayedCommands() End Sub
